T11arhebt_u:2673: kāryasvabhāvaviśeṣāṇām asāṅkaryād asty eva sāmagrīlakṣaṇakāraṇabhedāt kāryāṇāṃ bheda iti |

T11arhebt_u:2722: tasmād yadi `kāraṇabhedāt' kāraṇānekatvāt kāryasya bhedaḥ anekatvaṃ tadā pratibandhābhāvād anekāntaḥ |
T11arhebt_u:2723: na ca tadabhyupagamyata iti na kācit kṣatiḥ

T11arhebt_u:2777: tasmāt mṛtsaṃsthānayor ekātmataiveti [T. 274a.] na kāraṇānekatvāt kāryasyānekātmakatā aikāntikī, yato bhinnasvabhāvebhyaś cakṣurādibhyaḥ

T11arhebt_u:2795: anuvṛttilakṣaṇaṃ dravyavan nityaṃ ca, vyāvṛttilakṣaṇā [S. 101a.] bhedāḥ kṣaṇikāś ca;jaiminīyasya tu [T. 274b.] kecit kālāntarasthāyino 'pīti

T11arhebt_u:2806: yadi hi svabhāvato na bhedo dharmadharmiṇoḥ, saṅkhyādibhedād api naiva bhedaḥ |

T11arhebt_u:2811: [S. 101b.] sambhavi dharmirūpamātram abhidheyatvena vivakṣitam iti cet |

T11arhebt_u:2831: ekasvabhāvopagamāt, śaknotyādipadais tadvācināṃ sāmānādhikaraṇy adarśanāc ca |
T11arhebt_u:2833: yeṣāṃ ca paryāyāṇāṃ na kācid arthānugamamātrā tatra kiṃ vaktavyam? |
T11arhebt_u:2835: na hy eko bhāvaḥ kvacid apy anvayī siddha iti |
T11arhebt_u:2839: na hy asya paryāyāṇām ivocchedaḥ tadrūpeṇa[418], paryāyā [T. 275b.] eva paryāyarūpeṇa nirudhyante na tu dravyam iti nityam abhyupagamyate |
T11arhebt_u:2840: na ^7ceyaṃ[419]kūṭasthanityatā vā dravye sambhavati[420], paryāyavyatiriktasya dravyasyāsiddheḥ tasyopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya tadvivekānupalakṣaṇāt |
T11arhebt_u:2842: na punas tat tato vilakṣaṇam upalakṣyate |

T11arhebt_u:2848: tat tu na sambhavati dharmadharmiṇos tulyakālatvāt |
T11arhebt_u:2849: abhinnakālas tu kāryabhede 'naikāntikaḥ, vibhaktapariṇāmeṣu paṭādiṣu sambhavāt |
T11arhebt_u:2850: paṭādayo 'pi hi vibhaktapariṇāmā anekaṃ kāryaṃ kurvanto dṛṣṭāḥ

T11arhebt_u:3182: kva punar atiśayotpādanaṃ^1 sahakriyā pratiyayānāṃ na bhavati? |
T11arhebt_u:3184: na hi kvacid api sahabhāvinām atiśayotpādanalakṣaṇā[490][T. 284b.] sahakriyā {p. 114.1} sambhavati |
T11arhebt_u:3185: kā tarhi sahakriyā? ity āha -- ekārthakaraṇam ekakāryaniṣpādanaṃ yad
T11arhebt_u:3194: [ § 35. ekakāryakāritvam eva mukhyaṃ sahakāritvam itarat tu gauṇam |]
T11arhebt_u:3195: syād etat -- aupacārikam etat sahakāritvam, atiśayotpādanam eva tu
T11arhebt_u:3196: mukhyam ity ata āha -- tad eva ekakāryakāraṇalakṣaṇaṃ mukhyaṃsahakāritvam
T11arhebt_u:3199: kuta etat? ity āha -- tasyaiva anyasya vivakṣitakāryaṃ prati kāraṇatvāt |
T11arhebt_u:3201: yataḥ saha -- yugapat sarvantaḥ sahakāriṇa ucyante, antyaś ca kāraṇakalāpa evaṃvidha iti |
T11arhebt_u:3202: yathā cāntyasyaikārthakāraṇaṃ sahakāritvam evaṃ pūrvasyāpi kāraṇakalāpasyottarottaraviśiṣṭakṣaṇāntarārambhiṇa ity avaseyam,
T11arhebt_u:3204: tasmāt sarvaṃ kāryam aṅkurādikaṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ vā 'nekapratyayajanyam iti |
T11arhebt_u:3205: sarvatraikārthakriyaiva copacīyamānāpacīyamānakāryakāriṇaḥ kāraṇakalāpasya sahakāritvam, na viśeṣotpādanam iti |
T11arhebt_u:3206: syād etat -- ekārthakaraṇam api tatra [S. 114a.] sahakāritvam astu atiśayotpādanalakṣaṇam apīty ata āha -- tatra ca kṣaṇe 'ntye viśeṣasya karttum aśakyatvāt nātiśayotpādanam api sahakāritvam kuto viśeṣasya [T.
T11arhebt_u:3207: 285a.] karttum aśakyatvam? ity ata āha -- ekasya anaṃśasya svabhāvasyāvivekāt |
T11arhebt_u:3208: na hi tatra `ayam anāhitātiśayo bhāgaḥ svahetubhyo
T11arhebt_u:3209: jātaḥ, ayaṃ tu sahakāribhir āhitātiśayaḥ' iti viveko 'sti |
T11arhebt_u:3211: nāmāvivekaḥ, viśeṣas tu kim iti na kriyate? ity ata āha --
T11arhebt_u:3214: syānmatam -- bhinnasvabhāva evāntyasya viśeṣo 'stu ity ata āha --
T11arhebt_u:3216: yadi bhāvāntaralakṣaṇo viśeṣo {p. 115.1} bhavet tadā tasyāntyatvam eva hīyeta |
T11arhebt_u:3217: hīyenāṃ(hīyatāṃ) ko doṣaḥ? iti cet; tataśca anantyatvāt na sākṣāt kāraṇaṃsyāt |
T11arhebt_u:3218: yata evaṃ tasmān na kāraṇasya mukhyasya sahakāribhyaḥ sakāśād[491]viśeṣasyotpattiḥ ity ekārthakriyaiva sahakāritvam iti |
T11arhebt_u:3219: nanv asatyāṃ sahakāribhyo viśeṣotpattau kāryajanane sāmarthyam eṣāṃ na yujyata ity ata [S. 114b.] āha -- te samarthāh ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:3220: yadi hi te svabhāvenāsamarthā utpadyeran tadaiṣāṃ sahakāribhyaḥ sāmarthyotpattir abhyupagamyeta
T11arhebt_u:3223: yeṣām[492]ekakṣaṇaniyatatvāt tataḥ prāk paścāt pṛthak tv abhāvo nāsti |
T11arhebt_u:3224: yebhyaścānantaram eva kāryam utpadyate na kālāntareṇa tatra teṣv evaṃvidheṣu ekārthakriyaiva sahakāritvam nātiśayotpādanalakṣaṇam |
T11arhebt_u:3225: svabhāvataḥ sāmarthyasya [T. 285b.] bhāvavirodhāt, parasparataś cānabhyupagamāt samarthasya janmaivāyuktam iti manvānaḥ paraḥ āha --
T11arhebt_u:3240: ekārthakriyāniyama eva kṣaṇikānām ayuktaḥ, kevalānām apy aṃtyakṣaṇasarūpāṇāṃ darśanāt |
T11arhebt_u:3241: tathā hi -- `idam evaṃrūpaṃ naivaṃ ca' iti darśanādarśanābhyāṃ [S. 115a.] vibhajyate |
T11arhebt_u:3242: tatra yādṛśāḥ kṣityādayas tadanyapratyayasannidhāv upalabhyante tādṛśā eva kevalā api |
T11arhebt_u:3243: tatas tadanyasahitā iva kevalā api samartham aṅkurajanane svaṃ svaṃ kṣaṇāntaram ārabheran
T11arhebt_u:3244: tataḥ kevalasyāpy aṅkurādijananasvābhāvyād ajananāc ca `tatsvabhāvasya jananāt' ity anekānta eveti manyamānaḥ para {p. 116.1} āha
T11arhebt_u:3245: -- tāni svakāraṇāni kṣitibījādīni enaṃ samartham aparasya anyasya pratyayasya sannidhāna eva kiṃ kasmāt anayanti? na kevalāni?, sahitānām eva sarvadā sambhavāt iti cet āha -- kadācit kasmiṃścit kāle anyathā'pi
T11arhebt_u:3248: kārye yādṛśā yatsahitāḥ tādṛśā eva tadrahitā apīti |
T11arhebt_u:3249: [T. 286a.] janayan tu kevalā api sambhavantaḥ samartham, ko doṣaḥ? iti ced āha -- tataśca kevalānām api samarthajanakānāṃ sambhavāt eko 'pi na kevalam anekaḥ kvacid deśādau [S. 115b.] samarthaḥ utpannaḥ kṣitibījādir aṅkurādikāryaṃ janayet yadi tatsvabhāvasyāvaśyaṃ janakatvam na ca kevalo janayati tatsvabhāvasambhave 'pi tato 'nekānta iti paraḥ |
T11arhebt_u:3251: aparaiś cāparaiś ca kuśūla tadapanetṛpuruṣaprayatnapiṭakādiprakṣepakṣetranayanaprakiraṇādibhiḥ pratyayair yo yogaḥtena kāraṇena pratikṣaṇaṃbhinnaśaktayo na kadācit pūrvāparakālabhāvina ekaśaktayaḥ ^5aparāparapratyayayogalakṣaṇahetubhede
T11arhebt_u:3254: saṃskārāḥ sametya sambhūya ca pratyayaiḥ kriyamāṇāḥ santanvantaḥ santānena bhavanto yady api kutaścit sāmyād varṇena saṃsthānena anyena vā kenacitprakāreṇa sādṛśyād ekākāraparāmarśapratyayajananalakṣaṇāt samānaṃ rūpam eṣām iti sarūpāḥ sadṛśāḥ pratīyante pratyabhijñāyante tathāpi kṛtrimakṛtrimāṇāṃ iva maṇimuktādīnām aparāparapratyayayogalakṣaṇasāmagrībhedād bhinna eva visadṛśa eva na pratyabhijñānavaśād abhinnaḥ tulyarūpa eṣāṃ bījādīnāṃ svabhāvaḥ [T. 286b.]
T11arhebt_u:3255: yata evaṃ tena bhinnasvabhāvatvena bhinnaśaktitayā vā
T11arhebt_u:3256: 'parāparasāmagrījanyatvena kṣaṇānāṃ siddhayā kiñcid eva kṣitibījādikaṃ kasyacid eva kāryasyāṅkurādes {p. 117.1} tajjananasamarthasya vā kāraṇam |
T11arhebt_u:3258: tathā ca vyagrāṇāṃ kṣitibījādinām aṅkurajananasvabhāvatā samarthakṣaṇajananasvabhāvatā vā nāsty eveti tatsvabhāvasya jananād ajanakasya cātatsvabhāvatvād ity atra nānekāntaḥ yato yo yatsvabhāvaḥ sa svahetor evotpadyamānaḥ tādṛśo bhavati na punas tadbhave hetvantaram apekṣata ity atrānekāntaḥ syād iti |
T11arhebt_u:3259: pratyabhijñānasya ca sarūpatāviṣayasya sāmagrībhedād anumitabhinnaśaktisvabhāvatvena bādhyamānatayā prāmāṇyābhāvāt na tataḥ sarūpatāsiddhiḥ kṣaṇakṣayiṇām iti |
T11arhebt_u:3260: pūrvaṃ ca `ata evāna(eva ta)yor avasthayor vastubhedo niśceyaḥ'
T11arhebt_u:3272: kiñcid eva kasyacit kāraṇam ity uktam tatra kiṃ kasya kāraṇam iti śakyaparicchedam apy ādhyātmikeṣu tāvad darśayann āha -- tatra -- ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:3273: tatra teṣu pratikṣaṇaṃ śaktisvabhāveṣu kṣaṇikeṣu bhāveṣu |
T11arhebt_u:3275: vyavadhīyate yena, tadādir yeṣāṃ atidūrātyāsannatvādīnāṃ te
T11arhebt_u:3278: rūpendriyādiḥ[500]sa cāsau kāraṇakalāpaś ca sāmagrīlakṣaṇas tathoktaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:3279: avyavadhānādideśaś cāsau rūpendriyādikāraṇakalāpaś ca sa vijñānajanane samartho hetuḥ nānyaḥ, tadbhāva eva tasya bhāvāt, anyabhāve 'pi cābhāvāt,
T11arhebt_u:3285: {p. 118.1} imam evaṃvidhaṃ [S. 118a.] hetuphalabhāvapratiniyamaṃ niravadyamādhyātmakeṣu darśitam [T. 288a.] anyatrāpy atidiśann āha --
T11arhebt_u:3289: sarvatreti vacanāt akṣaṇikeṣv api pratītir mmā bhūt ity āha -- pratikṣaṇam ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:3291: 'nyāś cānyāś ca svabhāvabhedānvayinyaḥ śaktayo bhavanti tatrāyam
T11arhebt_u:3293: na tu ye sthiraikasvabhāvā bhāvāḥ paraiḥ kalpyante teṣv api |
T11arhebt_u:3300: kasmāt punaḥ sthiraikasvabhāveṣu neṣyate? ity āha -- svabhāva- ityādi
T11arhebt_u:3302: na tu svata eva svabhāvasyānyathātvaṃ sambhavati |
T11arhebt_u:3303: tataś ca sthiraḥ padārtho yadi kāryotpādanasamarthasvabhāvaḥ tato 'syākriyā nopapadyata iti sarvadaiva kuryāt |
T11arhebt_u:3305: tadāpi kriyā 'nupapannā, sarvadaiva na kuryād iti bhāvaḥ |
T11arhebt_u:3306: yat tu kadācit karoti kadācin na [S. 118b.] ity etan na labhyate |
T11arhebt_u:3307: tataś cākṣaṇikānāṃ tatkāryakriyāsamarthasvabhāvatve sahitāsahitāvasthayor ekarūpatvāt kevalānām api tatkāryakriyāprasaṅgena kuta ekārthakriyāpratiniyamalakṣaṇaṃ [T. 288b.] sahakāritvaṃ sambhavet? |
T11arhebt_u:3309: yady api kevalasyāpy akṣaṇikasya samarthaḥ svabhāvaḥ tathāpi anyasahitaḥ karoti na kevalaḥ
T11arhebt_u:3310: ayam api hy asya svabhāvaḥ yad -- `anyasahitena svakāryaṃ karttavyam na
T11arhebt_u:3313: anyasahitenaiva svakāryaṃ karttavyaṃ na kevalena ity etat kevalasyāsamarthasvabhāvatve yujyate nānyatheti manyamānasya praśnaḥ |
T11arhebt_u:3316: kevalasyāpy akṣaṇikasya samartha eva {p. 119.1} svabhāvaḥ anyathā 'syākṣaṇikataiva hīyeteti
T11arhebt_u:3317: siddhāntavādy āha -- kin na karoti iti
T11arhebt_u:3318: | na hi samarthasyākriyā, sahitasyāvasthāyām iva yujyata iti sahitasyaiva kriyām icchatā kevalasyāsamarthasvabhāvataivopagantavyā |
T11arhebt_u:3319: atha matam -- kevalasya yadi śiraś chidyate tathāpi na karotīty ata āha --
T11arhebt_u:3321: kāryānumeyaṃ hi sāmarthyaṃ na ca kevalasya kadācid api kāryakriyā 'stīti kathaṃ sāmarthyaṃ kalpyate? |
T11arhebt_u:3322: nāyaṃ niyamaḥ yat samarthasvabhāvenāvaśyam eva kāryaṃ karttavyam, anyathā 'pi darśanāt iti manyamāna [S. 119a.] āha paraḥ -- kuvindādayaḥ ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:3324: devānāṃpriyaḥ ṛjuḥ mūrkho vā [T. 289a.] sukhasaṃvardhitatvāt ramaṇasvabhāvaḥ, krīḍanaṃ
T11arhebt_u:3325: bāladharmaḥ, tatsādharmyeṇa prajñāvaikalyaṃ darśayati, sukhaidhitatvena śāstreṣv anabhiyogam
T11arhebt_u:3326: yo hy anabhiyukto durvuddhiś ca sa kṛtam api vastu vismaraṇaprakṛtitvāt punaḥ punaḥ kārayatīti punaḥ pratividhāpayati |
T11arhebt_u:3327: kva punar etat prativihitam? ity āha -- tathāhi -- ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:3333: kāryakriyādharmaṇaḥ tathābhāvaḥ kāryakriyā antyāvasthāvat sahitāvasthāyām iva anivāryaḥ |{120}
T11arhebt_u:3342: 119b.] karoti, sahitāvasthāyāṃ tv asya sāmarthyaṃ sahakāribhyo jāyate |
T11arhebt_u:3343: tataḥ sahita eva karotīty ata āha -- antyāvasthāyāṃsāmarthyotpattau kīdṛśasya prāg asamarthasya sataḥ tasya sāmarthyasya yasya tadupajāyate
T11arhebt_u:3350: [T. 289b.] apūrvasyaiva vastunaḥ sā utpattir yā tatsvabhāvasya
T11arhebt_u:3352: na hy ekasvabhāvatve sāmarthyam evāpūrvam upajātaṃ na samarthaḥ iti yuktam, tayoḥ svabhāvabhedaprasaṅgāt,
T11arhebt_u:3354: nanu pratīyamāne eva sāmarthyatadvator utpattyanupattī ekasvabhāvatā ca kathaṃ nihnotuṃ śakyate? iti cet |
T11arhebt_u:3356: apramāṇena pratīteḥ, anyathā pratītyanusāriṇā bhavatā dvicandrādayo 'pi na nihnotavyāḥ |
T11arhebt_u:3358: ihāpi vastuna ekasvabhāvasyotpattyanupattī parasparaviruddhe bādhike kiṃ neṣyete? |
T11arhebt_u:3359: vyavasthitasyaiva vajropalāder ddharmiṇaḥ [S. 120a.] tatsvabhāvaṃ sāmarthyam utpannam iti ca pūrvāparakālayor apratibhāsamānavivekaḥ kathaṃ pratīyāt? |
T11arhebt_u:3360: vijñānādikāryasyānutpattiyaugapadyodayaprasaṅgāt cakṣurādisānnidhye prāg asat tat sāmarthyam utpannaṃ kramavac ceti niścaya iti cet |
T11arhebt_u:3361: yady evam ekākāratayā pūrvāparakālayor adhi(vi)kṛtaṃ pratyabhijñānam upajāyamānam apūrvasāmarthyapratibhāsaviviktopalādigrāhy[506]apy anumānād arthāpattito vā bādhām anubhavan na pramāṇam ity upagataṃ syāt |
T11arhebt_u:3364: samarthasyaivāpūrvasyotpattiḥ[507]sadṛśāpabhāvagrahakṛtaś cārvāgdarśanānām ekatvavibhramo lūnapunarjjāteṣv iva keśanakhādiṣv iti kiṃ neṣyate? |
T11arhebt_u:3370: atha sāmarthyaṃ sahakāripratyayasānnidhyalakṣaṇam evety atatsvabhāvam iti nāpūrvotpattiprasaṅga [T. 290a.] itinaiyāyikādayo manyeran atrāha --
T11arhebt_u:3371: atatsvabhāvatve sāmarthyasyeṣyamāṇe sa ^3bījādiḥ padārthaḥ[508]prāg iva tadrūpāparityāgāt paścād apy akāraka eva |
T11arhebt_u:3373: sāmarthyam ity ākhyā yasya padārthāntarasya sahakāripratyayasānnidhyalakṣaṇasya sa
T11arhebt_u:3377: akṣaṇikāḥ teṣv apy evaṃ [S. 120b.] prasaṅgo 'nivārita eveti
T11arhebt_u:3379: punar apy akṣaṇikānām ekārthakriyāpratiniyamaṃ nirākartum upacayahetum āha -- api ca ityādi
T11arhebt_u:3380: yo 'sāv akṣaṇiko bhāvaḥ sakaleṣu sahakāriṣu svakāryaṃ karotītīṣyate, sa tadaiva tāvat kasmāt karoti? |
T11arhebt_u:3381: yena hi kāraṇena tatkāryakriyāsvabhāvatvena tadā karoti tene(nai)va
T11arhebt_u:3382: sthirasvabhāvatvāt prāg api kuryāt, tataḥ kuto 'syaikārthakriyāpratiniyamaḥ? iti bhāvaḥ
T11arhebt_u:3383: kācānyāmṛgyate yuktiḥyathātad dṛśyate tathā iti sarvatreyam apratihatā yuktir iti manyamānaḥkumārilaḥprāha -- kurvan dṛṣṭaḥ ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:3385: ^4tadaiva kāryaṃ kurvam(n)[509]dṛṣṭo mayā tena darśanabalena karotīti
T11arhebt_u:3386: brūmaḥ, ^5kim atrānyayopapattyā [T. 290b.] 'bhihitayā[510]?, prāk tat kurvan na dṛṣṭaḥ tena na karotīty ekārtha[kriyā]pratiniyamaḥ sidhyati akṣaṇikānām apīti |
T11arhebt_u:3387: bhāvo hi kāryaṃ karoti tajjananasvabhāvatayā na darśanabalenādṛṣṭasyāpi svakāryakaraṇāt ato nedam uttaraṃ sambadhyata ity upahasann āha -- aho mahāsāmarthyam ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:3388: mahāprabhāvasya bhavato mahāsāmarthyaṃ darśanam, yasmād etad bhāvān kāryakaraṇasvabhāvavikalān api -- yadi kāryakaraṇasvabhāvatvād bhāvāḥ kāryaṃ kuryuḥ tadaitad
T11arhebt_u:3389: evottaraṃ kiṃ noktam?, yataḥ [S. 121a.] kāryakaraṇe darśanam uttarīkṛtam
T11arhebt_u:3390: iti kṛtvā -- svabhāvamātreṇa ātmasattāmātreṇa nānāprākāreṣu vyāpāreṣu niyuṅkte tat kathaṃ mahāsāmarthyaṃ na syāt? |
T11arhebt_u:3392: akṣamā[511]kintu yadi nāma kiñcit kāranaṃ kathañcid anādṛtasya vā vyākṣiptasya vā atrabhavata iti pūjāvacanam {p. 122.1} darśanasya viṣayatām atikrāmet tadā hanta iti dainyodbhāvanam etat, aprasavo dharmo 'sya tad idam -- aprasavadharmakaṃ tato 'petasantānaṃ syād iti iyam
T11arhebt_u:3394: para āha -- na vai vayam ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:3395: naiva vayaṃ kāryakaraṇasvabhāvarahitānāṃ bhāvānām asmad darśanavaśāt
T11arhebt_u:3396: kāṛyakriyāṃbrūmaḥ, kintu svabhāvenaiva te bhāvāḥ tatkāryakaraṇasvabhāvāḥ,
T11arhebt_u:3402: siddhāntavādy āha -- satyam, idam apy asti |
T11arhebt_u:3403: kiṃ vayaṃ nyāyānurāgitayā nyāyyaṃ [T. 291a.] vacanam upalakṣayāmaḥ, uta bhavān eva sarvadā nyāyyavacanarahito 'pi kathañcin nyāyyam uktavān iti sañjātaparitoṣaḥ pṛcchati -- kiṃ tad? ity āha -- svabhāvas teṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ kāryakriyādharmā kāryakaraṇadharmā tena kāraṇena samastāh samagrāḥ pratyayāḥ sahakāriṇo yeṣāṃ teṣām akṛtvā kāryaṃ nopekṣāpattiḥ naudāsīny apratipattiḥ iti satyam
T11arhebt_u:3404: -- idam apy asti bhavato nyāyyaṃ vacanam iti, kintu idam asi praṣṭavyaḥ --
T11arhebt_u:3406: samagrāvasthāyāṃ yadanantaraṃ kāryam utpadyate tadaiva utpannaḥ? āhosvit prāg api parasparavirahāvasthāyām api āsīt? |
T11arhebt_u:3407: tatra tadaivotpanne tatsvabhāvatve 'pūrvotpattir eva, atatsvabhāvatve so 'kāraka eveti prāguktadoṣabhayāt para āha -- āsīt |
T11arhebt_u:3408: kutaḥ? pracyutaś ca utpannaś ca pracyutotpannaḥ[513], tasya pratiṣedhaḥ apracyuto 'nutpannaḥ
T11arhebt_u:3409: sthira ekaḥ svabhāvo yeṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ teṣāṃ kasmiṃścit kāle kasyacit svabhāvasya tatropalabdhasya abhāvavirodhāt |
T11arhebt_u:3410: kṣaṇikeṣv eva hy ekadā dṛṣṭaḥ svabhāvo 'nyadā na bhavet tadā tasyānyatvāt |

T11arhebt_u:3600: ekavacanam, yat samutpannaviśeṣam anantaroktena prakāreṇa kāraṇaṃ antyasāmagrīkṣaṇalakṣaṇaṃ tato 'ṅkurādikāryotpattau iṣyamāṇāyāṃ tasyaiva viśeṣasyādyasya kāryotpādanānuguṇasya yaḥ krameṇābhivarddhamānaḥ kāryasya janaka iṣyate tasyaiva utpattir na syāt prathamakṣaṇopanipātināṃ [T.
T11arhebt_u:3601: 297b.] parasparato viśeṣānāsādanāt kṣaṇānām avivekāt anabhyupagamāc ca |
T11arhebt_u:3602: parasparato 'navāptaviśeṣā eva kāryotpādanānuguṇaṃ viśeṣam ārapsyanta iti ced āha -- aviśiṣṭād aviśiṣṭebhyaḥ parasparato {p. 131.1} viśeṣasya kāryotpādānuguṇasyotpattāv iṣyamāṇāyāṃ kāryasya aṅkurādeḥ syāt,
T11arhebt_u:3604: tataś ca parasparato viśeṣotpādānapekṣiṇa eva sahakāriṇaḥ [S. 129a.] kāryaṃ kurvīran |
T11arhebt_u:3605: kim evaṃ sati siddhaṃ bhavati? iti cet, āha -- tena yena kṣaṇikā api parasparato viśeṣotpādā 'napekṣā eva svakāryaṃ kurvanti
T11arhebt_u:3606: ekakāryapratiniyamalakṣaṇaṃ ca sahakāritvaṃ pratipadyante tena kāraṇena akṣaṇikānām api kāraṇatāsyāt, apekṣaṇīyebhyaḥsvabhāvātiśayotpattiśca na syāt ity akṣaṇikavādī kṣaṇikapakṣeṇa[531]svapakṣasya sāmyamāpādayati |
T11arhebt_u:3618: tatraitat syāt prathamakṣaṇe 'pi kṣitibījādayaḥ parasparataḥ samutpannaviśeṣā eva sannidhīyante
T11arhebt_u:3620: iti nyāyād dhi dūradeśavarttinām api hetuphalabhāvāt ity āśaṅkyāha -- atha sahakāriṇā ityādi
T11arhebt_u:3624: tathā hi -- tadviśeṣotpattāv apy aparaḥ sahakārikṛto viśeṣo 'bhyupagantavyaḥ, tathā tadutpattāv apy anya iti |
T11arhebt_u:3625: atha naivaṃ sahakāriṇaḥ parasparasya kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣanimittam aparaṃ viśeṣaṃ kurvanti, svabhāvata eva tatra teṣāṃ yogyatvāt ity ata āha -- na ca ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:3626: naiva hi sahakāriṇaḥ kṣitibījādayaḥ parasparasya kāryotpādānuguṇo yo viśeṣaḥ tadutpādane nityaṃ sarvakālaṃ yogyāvasthā yena yogyāvasthatvena nityānuśaktaḥ nityānubaddhaḥ eṣāṃ kṣitibījādīnāṃ {p.
T11arhebt_u:3628: viśeṣotpattau kāryasyāpi syāt' ity etad api parihriyeta |
T11arhebt_u:3629: kuta etad? ity āha -- tadupāya ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:3633: yadi hi kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣotpādane sarvadā yogyāvasthāḥ syuḥ tadā so 'pi
T11arhebt_u:3635: tatas tatparamparābhāvi kāryam iti tadupāyāpāyayoḥ kāryasyotpattyanutpattī na syātām |
T11arhebt_u:3636: [S. 130a.] tasmān na sahakāriṇaḥ kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣotpādane yogyāvasthāḥ sarvadeti |
T11arhebt_u:3637: yataḥ sahakāriṇā pṛthagavasthitenānavasthābhayāt kṛtaviśeṣo nopatiṣṭhate parasparataś ca prathamasamparkkakṣaṇabhāvināṃ nopeyate[533]yujyate vā |
T11arhebt_u:3638: tena kāraṇenādyo viśeṣaḥ kāryotpādānuguṇaḥ sahakāribhyaḥ samānakālatayā nirupakārasya kṣitibījādeḥ notpadyate[534], utpadyate cāsau itīṣyate |
T11arhebt_u:3639: tena samagrāvasthāvat sarveṣāṃ vyagrāvasthābhāvinām api kṣaṇānām aviśeṣāt tajjananasvabhāvatve 'py ajananāt samagrāvasthāyām eva jananād |
T11arhebt_u:3640: yathā kṣaṇikānām ekārthakriyāpratiniyamalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvaṃ tathā sthirasvabhāvānām api bhaviṣyatīti kṣīṇasarvopāyo 'kṣaṇikavādī sāmyam evātura iva bahumanyamānas tatraiva bharaṃ[535]kṛtavān siddhāntavādī bhaṅgyā param upahasann āha -- nāsmākaṃpunaḥpunaḥ ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:3641: yadi punaḥ punar vacane 'pi lokasya nyāyapratītir bhavati śataśo 'pi
T11arhebt_u:3643: kim aṅga punar dvau trīn vā vārān? |
T11arhebt_u:3644: na hi parārthapravṛttānām asmākaṃ punaḥ punar abhidhāne kaścid udvego bhavati |
T11arhebt_u:3645: evaṃ vādinaś ca śāstrakṛtaḥ kvacit prakārāntareṇa[536]tam evārthaṃ [T. 299a.]
T11arhebt_u:3646: sphuṭīkurvato ye punaruktāparihārāya yat ante sa teṣām asthānapariśrama eva |
T11arhebt_u:3647: yadi nodvego hanta tarhy ucyatām ity ata āha -- na viśeṣotpādanād eva ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:3648: naiva viśeṣotpādanāt {p. 133.1} sahakāriṇāṃ sahakāritvaṃ paramārthataḥ kvacit [S. 130b.] sambhavati, yataḥ prathamakṣaṇabhāvināṃ bījādīnāṃ tadabhāvāt kāryotpādānuguṇe viśeṣe karttavye sahakāritāvirahaḥ
T11arhebt_u:3650: kintv ekārthakriyaiva sahakāriṇāṃ pāramārthikaṃ sahakāritvaṃ pūrvoktābhir yuktibhiḥ sambhāvyate
T11arhebt_u:3651: sā ca prathamasamparkkabhājām asty eveti kiṃ na sahakāriṇaḥ syuḥ? |
T11arhebt_u:3652: para āha -- sā 'py ekārthakriyā na bhavet parasparato viśeṣarahitānām |
T11arhebt_u:3653: yadi punaḥ parasparato viśeṣarahitānām api tadekārthakriyā 'ṅgīkriyate
T11arhebt_u:3654: tadā pratyekaṃ tadavasthāyāṃ tadutpādanasāmarthyābhyupagamāt tadavasthāyām iva pṛthag api sā bhavet |
T11arhebt_u:3655: tathā hi -- te tadavasthāyām api parasparato nirviśeṣā eva kurvanti |
T11arhebt_u:3656: teṣāṃ pṛthag api tadviśeṣakriyā katham iva na
T11arhebt_u:3658: na hy eṣāṃ saṃhatāsaṃhatāvasthayoḥ kaścid viśeṣo 'stīti |
T11arhebt_u:3659: bhavatu, ko doṣaḥ? iti cet; tathāca kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣasya pṛthakkaraṇaprasaṅge sati tasmād viśeṣād bhavanaśīlam aṅkurādi kāryam api viśeṣavat kevalāt sahakāriṇaḥ syāt iti cen manyase, atrāpi sarvam uktam
T11arhebt_u:3661: tathā hi -- saṃhatāsaṃhatāvasthayor nirviśeṣā eva kṣaṇakṣayiṇo bhāvā iti taducyate tat kiṃ tāvad viśeṣamātrāpekṣayā? āhosvit [T. 299b.]
T11arhebt_u:3666: na hi kadācit kiṃcid ekam eva, ādhāracchāyātapavātaśītāder yathāsambhavaṃ bhāvāt
T11arhebt_u:3667: | na ca tabhāve 'pi tat tādṛśam eva, kāraṇabhedāt |
T11arhebt_u:3669: kaścid viśeṣaḥ kvacit kārye 'nuguṇo na sarvaḥ sarvatreti |
T11arhebt_u:3670: etac ca prāg evoktam iti darśayann āha -- pratikṣaṇam aparāparaiḥpratyayaiḥ iti |
T11arhebt_u:3671: `aparāparapratyayayogena pratikṣaṇaṃ bhinnaśaktayaḥ saṃskārāḥ santanvanto yady api kutaścit sāmyāt sarūpāḥ pratīyante, tathāpi bhinna evaiṣāṃ
T11arhebt_u:3672: svabhāvaḥ, tena kiñcid eva kasyacit kāraṇam'[537]iti, `kṣaṇikeṣu {p.134.1}
T11arhebt_u:3673: bhāveṣv aparāparotpatter aikyābhāvāt'[538]iti cātra saṃkṣiptataram uktam |
T11arhebt_u:3674: evaṃ ca `nāsmākaṃ punaḥ punar vacana' ity atra dviḥ punargrahaṇaṃ yujyate |
T11arhebt_u:3675: yathā yena prakāreṇa bhāvasantāne viśeṣasyotpattiḥ [ta]d apy uktam --
T11arhebt_u:3676: `tatra svarasataḥ pūrvakṣaṇanirodhe tebhya eva viśiṣṭakṣaṇotpādād viśeṣotpattiḥ'[539]iti
T11arhebt_u:3677: atha kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣajanakaviśeṣāpekṣayā prāgvat prathamasamparkkabhājaḥ parasparato nirviśeṣā ity abhimataṃ tad apy ayuktam |
T11arhebt_u:3680: tadbhāva eva tasya bhāvāt etāvanmātranibandhanatvāc ca ^4janakaṃ
T11arhebt_u:3681: vya(-kavya)vasthāyāḥ[540]| te ca tathāvidhāḥ sarvadā na bhavantī kathaṃ pṛthag api kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣārambha eṣāṃ syāt?, yataḥ kevalānām api
T11arhebt_u:3682: kāryakriyā prasajyeta tad darśayati -- yogyo deśo yeṣāṃ te yogyadeśāḥ,
T11arhebt_u:3683: tadbhāvo yogyadeśatā, sā ādir yeṣāṃ avyavahitadeśatvādīnām avasthābhedānāṃ te tathoktāḥ, te ca te avasthābhedāś ca tathoktāḥ |
T11arhebt_u:3685: upajāyante te kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣalakṣaṇakāryakaraṇaśīlāḥ, naivaṃvidhāḥ sarvadā bījādaya iti katham eṣāṃ pṛthag api tathāvidhaviśeṣārambhaḥ syāt?
T11arhebt_u:3686: | etad api prāg evoktam `tatra yo 'vyavadhānādideśo rūpendriyādikalāpaḥ sa vijñānajanane samartho hetuḥ'[541]iti vacanāt |
T11arhebt_u:3688: ihāpi tatra yo 'vyavadhānādideśaḥ kṣitibījādikalāpaḥ sa kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣajanane samartho hetur iti pratīyata eva |
T11arhebt_u:3690: 132a.] tathāvidho viśeṣaḥ sarvadā na bhavati, tajjanakasya hetor abhāvāt |
T11arhebt_u:3692: etad api pūrvam evoktam ity āha -- teṣāṃ ca kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣa[janane] viśeṣavatāṃ yata utpattis tad apy uktam
T11arhebt_u:3693: asakṛd eva `yas teṣāṃ parasparopasarppaṇādyāśrayaḥ pratyayaviśeṣaḥ sa taddhetujanane samartho tathā `yathāsvaṃ pratyayaiḥ parasparopasarppaṇāśrayair ye {p. 135.1} yogyadeśādyavasthā jātās te saha svabhāvaniṣpattyā jñānahetutāṃ pratipadyanta'[543]ity anena, ihāpi gamyamānatvāt |
T11arhebt_u:3694: tato yady apy eṣāṃ parasparato 'nupapatter[544]viśeṣo na
T11arhebt_u:3696: na ca svahetuta eva sañjātaviśeṣāṇāṃ bhāve parasparatas tadāśaṃsā, yataḥ parasparato viśeṣāyogaḥ[545]pratipādyamānaḥ śobheta |
T11arhebt_u:3697: teṣāṃ ca kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣajanakānāṃ pratyayānāṃ pratyekaṃ sāmarthye 'pi
T11arhebt_u:3699: yathā kevalānām akriyā kartṛviśeṣasyāvyavadhānādideśakṣitibījādikalāpasya pṛthag ekaikasya samarthasya bhāvasyābhāvād ity etad apy asakṛd evoktam `teṣāṃ ca na pūrvaṃ
T11arhebt_u:3700: na paścāt na pṛthagbhāva iti samarthānāpi [S. 132b.]
T11arhebt_u:3703: kevalānām aprasaṅgāt kutaḥ kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣārambhadvārakaṃ kāryam api syād iti? |
T11arhebt_u:3704: kutaḥ punar ayaṃ kāmacāro labhyate yadaṅkurādikāryaṃ sahakāriṇaḥ parasparasya kāryotpādānuguṇāṃ viśeṣaparamparāṃ janayantaḥ kurvanti,
T11arhebt_u:3707: kathaṃ dvaividhyaṃ kāryāṇām iti? ata āha --
T11arhebt_u:3708: sahakāribhir avyavadhānādideśair anantaraṃ sañjanitāḥ parasparasya prāgavasthāpekṣaviśiṣṭakṣaṇabhāvalakṣaṇā ye viśeṣās tatparamparayā uttarottaraviśiṣṭaviśiṣṭatarādikṣaṇabhāvarūpayā utpattir ddharmo yasya tadātmakam ekaṃ kāryam |
T11arhebt_u:3709: anyac ca tadviparītaṃ yat sahakārisannidhimātreṇa bhavati na parasparakṛtāṃ viśeṣaparamparām apekṣate |
T11arhebt_u:3715: kuta etad? iti cet {p. 136.1} kāryakāraṇayoḥ svabhāvabhedāt |
T11arhebt_u:3717: kāraṇasāmagrīsannidhimātrajanyasvabhāvam, tad anyat tu tatpariṇāmāpekṣam iti |
T11arhebt_u:3718: kāraṇam api kiñcit [T. 301b.] svasannidhimātreṇa kāryajananasvabhāvaṃ svakāraṇebhya eva bhavati, yena parasparakṛtāṃ viśeṣaparamparāṃ svakāryakaraṇe nāpekṣate |
T11arhebt_u:3720: | yathā kiñcid eva śālyaṅkurajananasvabhāvam, tadviparītaṃ cāparam |
T11arhebt_u:3721: śālyaṅkuraś ca tadbījajanyasvabhāvo na yavādibījajanyasvabhāva iti na bhāvānāṃ svahetubalāyātāḥ pramāṇādhigatāḥ svābhāvāḥ paryanuyojyāḥ |
T11arhebt_u:3722: ye tu yajjananasvabhāvāḥ pramāṇato 'dhigatāḥ te kiṃ sarvadaiva tatsvabhāvāḥ?
T11arhebt_u:3723: āhosvit tadaiva? ity atra cintā pravarttate |
T11arhebt_u:3724: tatra sarvadā tatsvabhāvatve paścād iva prāg api tatkāryakriyāprasaṅgena pararūpeṇākārakasya [S. 133b.]
T11arhebt_u:3725: bhinnasvabhāvatā kārakākārakāvasthāyoḥ śāliyavabījādīnām iva tattvacintakair ucyate |
T11arhebt_u:3726: sadṛśāparabhāvanibandhanaṃ caikatayā pratyabhijñānaṃ lūnapunarjāteṣv iva keśanakhādiṣu ^6ity
T11arhebt_u:3730: teṣāṃ parasparasantānopakāram apekṣate yat kāraṇam antyavasthāprāptaṃ tasya yat kāryam aṅkurādikaṃ tajjanmanimittaṃ sahakāriṇāṃ prathamakṣaṇānantaraṃ viśiṣṭadvitīyakṣaṇabhāvarūpo yo [T. 302a.] viśeṣaḥ kāryotpādānuguṇaḥ ādyo bhavati sa teṣāṃ sahakāriṇāṃ prathamasamparkkabhājāṃ parasparakṛto yo viśeṣas tajjanmā na bhavati parasparopasarppaṇādyāśrayād eva pratyayaviśeṣāt tasya bhāvāt tataḥ kāryotpādānuguṇād ādyād viśeṣāt prathamakṣaṇopanipātibhiḥ sahakāribhir anyataḥ [S. 134a.] samāsāditaviśeṣaiḥ janitāt tatprabhṛti ye viśeṣāḥ prakṛṣyamāṇataduttarottarakṣaṇabhāvalakṣaṇā jāyante te tajjanmānaḥ sahakārikṛtaviśeṣajanmānaḥ |
T11arhebt_u:3732: parasparopasarppaṇādyāśrayāt pratyayaviśeṣād āsāditatadanukūlaviśeṣaiḥ sahakāribhiḥ parasparopakāranirapekṣair janyasvabhāvatvāt, taduttareṣāṃ ca viśeṣāṇāṃ {137.1} sahakārikṛtakāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣajanyasvabhāvatvāt yata evam iti tasmāt ^1nānavasthā prāg[549]uktā |
T11arhebt_u:3733: atha sahakāriṇā kṣityādinā kuśūlādyavastho 'pi bījādiḥ tenāpi kṣityādiḥ kṛtaviśeṣa evopatiṣthetānavasthaivaṃ syāt iti |
T11arhebt_u:3734: tasya prakārasyānabhyupabgamāt puruṣaprayatnāder eva [T. 301b.] kṣetraprakiraṇahetor avyavahitasnigdhapṛthivībījasamparkkalakṣaṇasya kāryopādānuguṇaviśeṣajanakasya viśeṣe 'syopagamāt |
T11arhebt_u:3736: `yathā prathamasamparttabhājaḥ kṣitibījādayaḥ parasparasya viśeṣamanād adhānāh kāryotpādānuguṇaṃ viśeṣaṃ janayanti, tathā [S. 134b.] sthirarūpā api bhāvāḥ tadekakāryapratiniyatāḥ parasparakṛtaviśeṣanirapekṣā eva
T11arhebt_u:3737: bhāviṣyanti' iti, tadabhyupagacchann āha -- tathāyady akṣaṇiko 'pi ityādi
T11arhebt_u:3738: | kṣaṇikavad akṣaṇiko 'pi yadi kāryaṃ karoti karotu nāma |
T11arhebt_u:3740: kintu yena svabhāvena kāryaṃ karoti sa yadi avilambitakāryakartṛdharmā apekṣeṇa karotīty evaṃśīlo dharmo yasya sa tathoktaḥ, tadā pṛthagbhāvasya sambhavāt kevalo 'pi na kevalaṃ sahitaḥ
T11arhebt_u:3741: tathāsyāt tatkāryakārakaḥ syād ity uktaṃ bahuśaḥ |
T11arhebt_u:3742: atatsvabhāvas tu akṣepakartṛsvabhāvavikalas tu tadā'pi sahitāvasthāyām api prāgvat akāraka eva pararūpeṇa kartṛtvasya pūrvam eva niṣedhāt |
T11arhebt_u:3743: tad evam ekārthakriyayā viśeṣotpādanena cākṣaṇikānāṃ sahakāritvaṃ niṣidhyopasaṃharann āha -- tasmāt ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:3744: dvividhasyāpi sahakāritvasyāyogān naivākṣaṇikasya kaścit [T. 303a.] sahakārīti kevalo 'pi svakāryaṃ kuryād iti sahakāripratyayāpekṣasyākṣaṇikasya hetutāṃ bruvāṇasya kiṃ yuktam iti [S. 135a.] darśayann āha -- prāyas tu ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:3745: yo hi sthirahetuvādī tasya yadi sa hetuḥ pratyayāntarāṇy apekṣya kāryaṃ karoti tadā vyaktam avaśyaṃ tasya sthirasya hetoḥ pratyayāntarāpekṣakārakasya svabhāvāntarasyotpattir iti |
T11arhebt_u:3747: yataḥ sahakāriṇāṃ yaḥ saṃghātaḥ sannipātaḥ tatsthāyī tatra varttamāno bhāvasantānaḥ prāyaḥ bāhulyena sahakāripratyayair upajanitaviśeṣaḥ san svakāryaṃkurvan dṛṣṭo {p. 138.1}
T11arhebt_u:3750: tatsambhavino nyāyasyākṣaṇikeṣu pṛthagbhāvasambhavena kathañcid api kalpayitum aśakyatvāt
T11arhebt_u:3751: prāgakārakasya paścāt kārakasvabhāvāntarotpattis tu na virudhyate |
T11arhebt_u:3752: tasyaiva hy akārakasya tadātmā kārakaḥ svabhāvo na yujyate na tv atadātmā |
T11arhebt_u:3756: atha matam -- kārakasvabhāvāntarotpattir iṣyate yadi sthirasya hetoḥ prāg api kārakasvabhāvo [S. 135b.] na syāt |
T11arhebt_u:3757: tasya tu prāg api bhāvāt pratyayāntarāpekṣā tadutpattir apy ukteti ata āha -- kārakasya ityādi
T11arhebt_u:3758: yadi hi samagrāvasthāyāḥ prāg api kārakasvabhāvo bhavet tadā 'syākriyā na
T11arhebt_u:3759: yujyate, saṃhatāvasthāyām api tatsvabhāvatayaiva karaṇāt, pararūpeṇa kartṛtvasya prāg eva niṣiddhatvāt |
T11arhebt_u:3763: yadi ca pratyayāntarair apy asau na kriyeta tat ^2kim iti mudhaiva tāny apekṣate?[550]iti
