T11arhebt_u:4004: -- `yat sat tat kṣaṇikam eva' ity anvayavyatirekarūpāyā vyāpteḥ siddhir niścayo bhavati |
T11arhebt_u:4005: nanu ca prakārāntarābhāvāt kāryam aṅkurādikaṃ bījādinā kramayaugapadyābhyām eva kriyata ity ucyate sa eva tu prakārāntaravirahaḥ
T11arhebt_u:4011: tataḥ prakārāntareṇārthakriyāsambhavāt kramayaugapadyanivṛttāv api nārthakriyāsāmartthyanivṛttir iti kuto 'kṣaṇikatve sati sarvasāmarthyavirahalakṣaṇam asattvam?, yataḥ sattvasya kṣaṇikātmatayā
T11arhebt_u:4015: [S. 143a.] tathā hi -- kramo nāma paripāṭiḥ kāryāntarāsāhityaṃ kaivalyam aṅkurādeḥ,
T11arhebt_u:4019: pratyakṣabodhagamyamāne saty upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpta eva svabhāvaḥ kramayaugapadyabhāvabahirbhūto nopalabhyate |
T11arhebt_u:4022: tasya cāṅkurādibhāvasyāvasthādvayabahirbhāvaniṣedhe kayościddeśakālayoḥ deśāntarādau krameṇāṅkurādibhāvavatītarasmin vā bhāve 'pi na kācit kṣatiḥ
T11arhebt_u:4023: | tataḥ pratyakṣata eva [T. 311a.] prakārāntarābhāvasiddheḥ kathaṃ kramayaugapadyābhyām arthakriyāśaktir avyāptā syāt? |śāstrakāras tu yathā pratyakṣatā eva prakārāntarābhāvasiddhiḥ tathā svayam etena kramākramādayo
T11arhebt_u:4026: evābhāvasi)ddhiḥ tathā hi -- anyonyavyavacchedarūpāṇām ekaniṣedhenāparavidhānāt tasyā[570]'pratiṣedhe vidhipratiṣedhayor virodhād ubhayapratiṣedhātmanaḥ prakārāntarasya kutaḥ sambhavaḥ? |
T11arhebt_u:4028: yatra yatprakāravyavacchedena yaditaraprakāravyavasthānaṃ na tatra prakārāntarasambhavaḥ, tad yathā --
T11arhebt_u:4030: asti ca kramayaugapadyayor anyataraprakāravyavacchedena taditaraprakāravyavasthānam vyavacchidyamānaprakārāviṣayīkṛte
T11arhebt_u:4032: [573] ca tato bahirbhāvalakṣaṇa ity anayos tattvā 'nyatvarūpayor
T11arhebt_u:4037: viruddhopalabdhiṣu bahirddharmiṇi hetoḥ sadbhāvam upadarśya virodhasādhanam eva bādhakam, tac cehāsti |
T11arhebt_u:4038: tato viruddhayor ekatrāsambhavāt pratiyogyabhāvaniścayaḥ śītoṣṇasparśayor iva bhāvābhāvayor iva veti kuto 'navasthā? |
T11arhebt_u:4039: tatra na krameṇākṣaṇikaḥ kāryāṇi karoty aviśeṣād akārakāvasthāyām iva |
T11arhebt_u:4041: sarveṣāṃ caikakriyākāla eva kriyāprasakteḥ, tatkārakasya svabhāvasya tadaiva bhāvāt |
T11arhebt_u:4045: anyathā prāg apy akārakarūpāviśeṣād kriyā syāt |
T11arhebt_u:4047: śaktāśaktatayā tarhy ekatraiva kārye bhedaprasaṅgaḥ śālikodravabījāder iva |
T11arhebt_u:4048: nityaś ca yadā yugapat karoti tataḥ prāg api bhāvāt tadaiva tatkriyāprasaṅgaḥ punas tato 'pi pūrvataram ity evaṃ [S.
T11arhebt_u:4050: pūrvottarakālayoś caikadā yugapat kāriṇo 'nyadā {p. 149.1} sarvārthakriyāsāmarthyavirahalakṣaṇam asattvaṃ syād iti kathaṃ na kṣaṇikatā? |
T11arhebt_u:4054: tanānāmasattvaprasaṅgāt[575]kṣaṇikatāyām eva sattvam iti yat sat tat
T11arhebt_u:4055: kṣaṇikam eveti sato naśvarātmatāsiddheḥ anvayavyatirekarūpavyāptisiddhir iti ||[576]
T11arhebt_u:4066: [576] T. adds here brāhmaṇācataviracite vivaraṇe svabhāvahetvadhikāraḥ prathamaḥ |
T11arhebt_u:4068: tad evaṃ svabhāvahetau tādātmyasiddhinibandhanam anvayavyatirekaniścayaṃ pratipādya kāryahetau kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhinimittatvāt tayos tasyāś ca pratyakṣānupalambhanibandhanāyāḥ prāg eva darśitatvāt tadgatam aparam api pareṣāṃ bhrāntikāraṇam apanetuṃ tadviṣayaṃ darśayann āha -- arthāntare hetor vyatirikte vastuni gamye kāryaṃhetuḥ |
T11arhebt_u:4069: anarthāntare tu svabhāvo hetur ity uktam |
T11arhebt_u:4070: kasmāt [S. 145a.] punar arthāntare kāryam eva hetur ity
T11arhebt_u:4071: āha -- avyabhicārāt iti kāryam eva hy arthāntaraṃ na vyabhicarati nānyat
T11arhebt_u:4072: yathoktaṃ prāk tataḥ kāryam evārthāntare gamye hetur ucyate saṃyogavaśād gamakatve |
T11arhebt_u:4074: gamyagamakabhāvaprasaṅgaācāryeṇoktaḥ parasya, tam ihāpi kāryahetau paraḥ kadācit prasañjayed ity āśaṅkamāna āha -- kāryakāraṇa- ityādi [T. 312b.]
T11arhebt_u:4075: yadi hi kāryaṃ hetur ucyate tadā kāryakāraṇabhāvena kāraṇenāsya gamakatvam
T11arhebt_u:4076: | tathā ca sati sarvathā gamyagamakabhāvaḥ prāpnoti |
T11arhebt_u:4077: agneḥ sāmānyadharmavad viśeṣadharmā api tārṇapārṇādayo gamyāḥ syuḥ |
T11arhebt_u:4078: dhūmasyāpi viśeṣadharmavad dravyatvapārthivatvādayo 'pi sāmānyadharmā gamakā bhaveyuḥ
T11arhebt_u:4081: sa ca nāgnidhūmayor aṃśena api tu sarveṇa prakāreṇa |
T11arhebt_u:4083: yathā agnir agnitvadravyatvasatvādibhiḥ sāmānyadharmair janakaḥ tathā tārṇapārṇatvādibhir viśeṣadharmair api, yathā ca dhūmo
T11arhebt_u:4086: tataś ca yathā tayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ tathaiva gamyagamakabhāvaḥ prāpnoti, tasyaiva tannibandhanatvād iti pūrvapakṣāśaṅkā |
T11arhebt_u:4087: atrāha -- na sarvathājanyajanakabhāvaḥ tataś ca kutas tathā gamyagamakabhāvaḥ syāt? |
T11arhebt_u:4088: kasmāt? iti cet, {p. 151.1} tadbhāve teṣāṃ tārṇapārṇatvādīnāṃ
T11arhebt_u:4089: viśeṣadharmāṇām abhāve bhavato dhūmamātrasya tebhya eva viśeṣadharmebhyo bhavatīti evam ātmanaḥ tadutpattiniyamasyābhāvāt |
T11arhebt_u:4090: tathā tadabhāve agnyabhāve bhavato dravyatvādeḥ [T. 313a.] sāmānyadharmasyāgner evāyaṃ bhavatīty evaṃrūpasya tadutpattiniyamasyābhāvāt kutaḥ sarvathā janyajanakabhāvaḥ?, yataḥ sarvathā gamyagamakabhāvaḥ syāt |
T11arhebt_u:4091: na hy asati tadutpattiniyame janyajanakabhāvo vyavasthāpayituṃ yuktaḥ[579]| yata evaṃ tasmāt kāryaṃ dhūmādikaṃ svabhāvair yāvadbhir dhūmatvādibhiḥ svagataiḥ |
T11arhebt_u:4097: kāraṇāśritair yāvadbhiḥ [S. 146a.] svabhāvair vinā te kāryagatāḥ svabhāvā na bhavanti hetuḥ tais teṣām iti gamyate |
T11arhebt_u:4100: idānīṃ kāraṇasthaiḥ svabhāvair yāvadbhir agnitvadravyatvādibhir avinābhāvi teṣāṃ kāraṇagatānāṃ sāmānyadharmāṇāṃ hetuḥ kāryaṃ gamakam |
T11arhebt_u:4102: tatkāryatvaniyamāt teṣām eva kāraṇagatānāṃ sāmānyadharmāṇāṃ tat kāryam ity evaṃrūpasya niyamasya sadbhāvāt |
T11arhebt_u:4103: na hi tān sāmānyadharmān kadācid api kāryaṃ vyabhicarati |
T11arhebt_u:4105: prāktanenārthena^2 kāryagatam aṃśaṃ nirūpayann āha -- tair eva ca ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:4106: kāryam api tair eva dharmaiḥ [T. 313b.] svagataiḥ kāraṇagatānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ
T11arhebt_u:4110: teṣām eva kāryagatānāṃ viśeṣadharmāṇāṃ kāraṇagatasāmānyadharmāpekṣayā kāryatvaniyamāt |
T11arhebt_u:4114: kāryatvaniyamaḥ, nānyeṣāṃ {p. 152.1} dravyatvādīnāṃ kāraṇasthasāmānyadharmair vinā bhavatām
T11arhebt_u:4115: tad evaṃ kāraṇasya sāmānyadharmā eva gamyā na viśeṣadharmāḥ, kāryasyāpi viśeṣadharmā eva gamakā na sāmānyadharmāḥ, tatkāryatvaniyamāt |
T11arhebt_u:4116: ye tu kāraṇasya viśeṣadharmā yais tatkāryatvaniyamaḥ kāryamātrasya nāstīti na te gamyāḥ |
T11arhebt_u:4117: ye ca kāryasya sāmānyadharmā dravyatvādayas teṣām api tatkāryatvaniyamābhāvād eva gamakatvaṃ nāstīti kāryakāraṇabhāvena gamakatve kutaḥ sarvathā gamyagamakabhāvaḥ pareṣām iva prasajyeta? __________NOTES__________
T11arhebt_u:4123: [ § 2. janyajanakabhāvasya sarvathā sattve 'pi gamyagamakabhāvasya na tathātvam |]
T11arhebt_u:4125: yadi hi kāraṇasya sāmānyadharmā eva gamyāḥ kāryasyāpi viśeṣadharmā eva gamakāḥ tatkāryatvaniyamād iṣyante, hanta tarhy aṃśena janyajanakabhāvaḥ prāptaḥ |
T11arhebt_u:4126: kāraṇasya sāmānyadharmā eva janakā na viśeṣadharmāḥ, kāryasyāpi viśeṣadharmā eva janyā na sāmānyadharmā iti syāt |
T11arhebt_u:4128: etat pariharati -- nāṃśena janyajanakabhāvaprasaṅgaḥ, niraṃśatvena vastunaḥ sarvātmanā tadabhyupagamāt, gamyagamakabhāvasyāpi sarvathā 'bhimatatvāt |
T11arhebt_u:4130: yadi hi kāryasya taiḥ kāraṇagatair viśeṣadharmair janyo yo viśeṣaḥ sa grahītuṃ śakyate, tadā tajjanyaviśeṣagrahaṇe 'bhimatatvāt [S. 147a.] kāraṇagataviśeṣadharmāṇāṃ gamyatvasya |
T11arhebt_u:4131: tathā liṅgaviśeṣo dhūmatvādiḥ upādhir viśeṣaṇaṃ yeṣāṃ dravyatvādīnāṃ sāmānyānāṃ kāryagatānāṃ teṣāṃ cābhimatatvād gamakatvasya |
T11arhebt_u:4132: tathā hi -- agurudhūmagrahaṇe bhavaty eva tadagner anumānaṃ dhūmatvaviśeṣaṇena ca dravyatvādinā 'gner anumānam |
T11arhebt_u:4133: na hi sarvathā janyajanakabhāvo 'stīty eva tathaiva gamyagamakabhāvo bhavati, tasya jñānāpekṣatvāt
T11arhebt_u:4134: tathā hi -- na sattāmātreṇa liṅgasya gamakatvam, tasya
T11arhebt_u:4135: jñāpakatvāt[582]| jñāpako hi svaniścayāpekṣo jñāpyam arthaṃ jñāpayati,
T11arhebt_u:4140: yadi hi tajjanyaviśeṣagrahaṇarahitam aviśiṣṭaṃ kāryamātram upādīyate liṅgaviśeṣopādhirahitaṃ vā dravyādikaṃ tadā aviśiṣṭasāmānyavivakṣāyāṃ kāraṇagataviśeṣābhāve 'pi dhūmamātrasya bhāvāt tadaviśiṣṭasya ca dravyatvāder agnyabhāve 'pi bhāvād vyabhicāra iti
T11arhebt_u:4141: sarvathā [S. 147b.] janyajanakabhāvo neṣyate, tadabhāvād gamyagamakabhāvaś ca |
T11arhebt_u:4143: tathā hi -- yadi nāma dhūmamātraṃ tārṇapārṇādiviśeṣābhāve bhavati, na tu tajjanyo viśeṣaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:4144: sa yadi grahītuṃ śakyate, tadā viśeṣasya gamyatvam asty eva, niścitasyaiva liṅgatvāt |
T11arhebt_u:4145: tathā yady api dravyatvasattvamātram agnyabhāve 'pi bhavati na tu dhūmātmakam iti tadviśiṣṭasyāvyabhicārād gamakatvam api na vāryata iti
T11arhebt_u:4150: atra parasya vacanāvakāśam āśaṅkyāha -- kasyacit dhūmādeḥ kadācit
T11arhebt_u:4151: kasmiṃścit kāle kutaścit agnyādeḥ bhāve 'pi sati sarvo dhūmādiḥ tādṛśo yādṛśa ekadā 'gnyāder bhavan dṛṣṭaḥ tajjātīyaḥ, tathāvidhajanmā yathāvidhāt sa eko bhavan dṛṣṭaḥ tādṛśād eva janma yasya sa |
T11arhebt_u:4152: tathāvidhajanmety etat kutaḥ pramāṇād avasitam? yenocyate [T. 315a.]
T11arhebt_u:4158: tatraiva hi tayor vyāpāras tasyaiva tatkāryatā bhavatu, tad anyasya tu kim āyātam? yena tathāvidhād asya janma syāt |
T11arhebt_u:4159: evaṃ hi kasyāściddhūmavyakter agnyādijanyatā dṛṣṭeti kinna ghaṭāder api sā 'bhyupagamyate? {p. 154.1} anyatvena viśeṣābhāvāt |
T11arhebt_u:4160: ka evaṃ sati doṣaḥ? iti cet; tathā ca pramāṇābhāvena
T11arhebt_u:4161: tathāvidhajanmatvāniścayād atādṛśād api janmāśaṅkāyāṃ tādṛśasya dhūmāder agnyādinā 'nvayavyatirekau na niścitāv iti kutaḥ kāryahetor ggamakatvam? |
T11arhebt_u:4162: na hi yo 'smāv eko deśakālāvasthāniyato 'gniviśeṣahetuko dhūmo 'dhigataḥ
T11arhebt_u:4166: tādṛśasya sāmānyātmana eva liṅgatvāt tasya cātathāvidhād api janmāśaṅkāyāṃ kutas tathāvidhenānvayo vyatireko vā? |
T11arhebt_u:4177: agnyādisāmagrījanyo dhūmaviśeṣa ekadā niścitas tadapekṣayā yathā 'nyo
T11arhebt_u:4178: dhūmaviśeṣas tādṛśo yo 'nyādṛśād api -- bhāvānāṃ vicitraśaktitayā --
T11arhebt_u:4179: bhaved iti śaṅkyate, tathā so 'py ekadā 'gnyādisāmagrījanyatayā niścitas tadanyāpekṣayā tādṛśa eva |
T11arhebt_u:4180: tatra yadi tad anyasya tādṛśasyātādṛśāj janma syāt ^3tadā tādṛśasya[587]svabhāvasya ^4nāgnyādisāmagrījanyasvabhāvateti
T11arhebt_u:4183: tataś cāgnyādisāmagryā akāraṇatvāt yo mayaikadā tato bhavan dṛṣṭo dhūmaḥ so 'pi na bhavet
T11arhebt_u:4184: na hi yad yasya kāraṇaṃ na bhavati tat tataḥ sakṛd api jāyate, tasyāhetukatvaprasaṅgād iti |
T11arhebt_u:4185: atadbhāvinaḥ iti tacchabdena vivakṣitam agnyādikāraṇaṃ parigṛhyate, na tat atat, tadvilakṣaṇaṃ atādṛśaṃ śakramūrddhādikam, atasmād[589]bhavituṃ [T. 316a.] śīlaṃ {p. 155.1} yasya tasyātadbhāvinas tādṛśasya tallakṣaṇasya dhūmavastunaḥ sakṛd api ekadā 'pi
T11arhebt_u:4188: 'gnyādisāmagrītaḥ tatas tādṛśasya svabhāvasya tādṛśam eva kāraṇam ity avagamyate sakṛtpravṛttābhyām eva pratyakṣānupalambhābhyām iti kuto
T11arhebt_u:4190: tena yādṛśo dhūmo 'gnyādisāmagryā bhavan dṛṣṭaḥ sakṛt
T11arhebt_u:4191: tādṛśasya tasya tajjanyasvabhāvatayā tādṛśād eva bhāvāt `yatra dhūmas
T11arhebt_u:4193: athavā 'nyathā vyākhyāyate -- iha pratyakṣānupalambhanibandhanā kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhiḥ prāguktā tannibandhanāv anvayavyatirekau
T11arhebt_u:4194: ^6pratipādayitum, tac cāyuktam[590]| tathā hi -- kasyacit dhūmasyāgnyādisāmagryanantarabhāvina ādyasya kadācit prathamotpādakāle kutaścid agnyādisāmagryāḥ bhāve 'pi utpāde 'pi sarvas yādṛśaḥ[591]prathamakṣaṇabhāvī dhūmo dvitīyādikṣaṇeṣv api tādṛśaḥ pratyakṣata eva tasya pūrvakṣaṇāvilakṣaṇatayā pratīteḥ |
T11arhebt_u:4195: tathāvidhajanmā iti yathāvidhād agnīndhanasāmagrīlakṣaṇāt kāraṇād ādyo dhūmakṣaṇa utpannas tathāvidhāj janma yasya sa tathāvidhajanmety etat kutaḥ naiva tasya dhūmāder abhāvāt [T. 316b.] evaṃ ca yadyato dṛṣṭaṃ tasyānyato 'pi
T11arhebt_u:4196: bhāvasya darśanāt sarvatrānāśvāsa [S. 149b.] iti anyamāna āha -- tathāca anagnito dhūmād api dhūmasya bhāve śakramūrddhāder api tasya bhāvāvirodhād agninā dhūmasya nānvayavyatirekāv iti cen manyasa iti pūrvapakṣāśaṅkā |
T11arhebt_u:4201: evaṃ tṛtīyakṣaṇādiṣv apy aṅkurādiṣu ca sarvatra vācyam |
T11arhebt_u:4202: kutaḥ punar ayaṃ vibhāgaḥ? iti cet, āha --
T11arhebt_u:4206: yathā hi prathamakṣaṇāpekṣayā dvitīyas tādṛśas tathā tadapekṣayā prathamo 'pīti
T11arhebt_u:4207: tādṛśatvāviśeṣāt tādṛśasyānagnito bhāve tādṛśo nāgnijanyasvabhāvaḥ iti sakṛd api tato na bhavet
T11arhebt_u:4208: bhavan vā tajjanyasvabhāvatām ātmanas tādṛśaḥ khyāpayatīti kuto 'nyādṛśād bhavet? tasmād anyādṛśād bhavann anyādṛśa eva tato na vyabhicāraḥ |
T11arhebt_u:4224: kathaṃ tarhi loke sarvatra dhūmavyavahāraḥ iti cet;
T11arhebt_u:4226: sādṛśye sati kathaṃ na tādṛśatā? iti cet |
T11arhebt_u:4228: tathā hi -- gosadṛśo bhavati gavayaḥ na tu tādṛśaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:4233: tattvādhyavasāyo 'pi tāvad -- atasminn arvāgdṛśāṃ [T. 317b.] vinivārayituṃ na pāryate, kim aṅga punas tādṛśatvādhyavasāyaḥ? yathoktam -
T11arhebt_u:4236: tattvacintakās tu tādṛśātādṛśakāraṇabhedāt tādṛśātādṛśatāṃ bhāvānāṃ anumanyante na tādṛśatām
T11arhebt_u:4237: tad yady atādṛśād api tādṛśo bhavet tadā tasya tajjanyaḥ svabhāva ity atadbhāvinaḥ sakṛd api tato bhāvo na syāt |
T11arhebt_u:4238: amum evārthaṃ samarthayamāna āha -- parasparāpekṣayā ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:4239: kāraṇāpekṣayā hi janyasvabhāvaṃ kāryam, kāryāpekṣayā ca janakasvabhāvaṃ kāraṇam |
T11arhebt_u:4240: yato hi kāraṇād yad bhavad dṛṣṭam tasya tajjanyasvabhāvaḥ, itarasya ca tajjanaka
T11arhebt_u:4242: anyathā tasya tato bhāvāyogāt, itarasya ca tajjananāyogāt
T11arhebt_u:4243: | yadi nāmaivaṃ tataḥ prakṛte kiṃ siddham? ity ata āha tatra evasmin nyāye
T11arhebt_u:4244: sati yadi dhūmo yādṛśa ādyo 'gnyādisāmagrījanitas tādṛśo dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvī agnyādisāmagryā [S. 151a.]
T11arhebt_u:4245: agnīndhanādikāraṇakalāpāt tajjanakasvabhāvatayā nirddhāritād[595]anyato 'gnīndhanādisāmagrījanitād ādyād dhūmakṣaṇād bha-vet |
T11arhebt_u:4246: tadā tasya tādṛśasya dhūmasvabhāvasya tajjanyo 'gnyādisāmagrījanyaḥ svabhāvo na bhavati kintu dhūmajanya eveti kṛtvā sakṛd api tato 'gnyādisāmagrīto na bhavet |
T11arhebt_u:4248: svabhāvasyānyato bhāve tajjanyasvabhāvatā, nāgnyādijanyasvabhāvateti kutaḥ sakṛd api tato ^1bhāvo yujyate[596]| atra dṛṣṭāntaḥ arthāntaravad iti |
T11arhebt_u:4249: yathā hy arthāntaram[597]atajjanyābhimatam anyato bhavat na
T11arhebt_u:4250: tajjanyasvabhāvaṃ nāgnyādisāmagrījanyasvabhāvam iti sakṛd api tato na bhavati tadvat tādṛśo dhūmo 'pīti tato bhavann anyādṛśa evāsāv iti gamyate
T11arhebt_u:4251: syānmatam -- agnyādisāmagryā 'sāv atajjanyasvabhāvo 'pi tādṛśo balāj janyate kas tasya tapasvino 'parādhaḥ? ity ata āha -- nāpi na kevalaṃ
T11arhebt_u:4252: svayam atajjanyasvabhāvatayā tato na bhavet, kintv agnyādisāmagry api taṃ tādṛśaṃ dhūmaṃ -- yādṛśo dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvī {p. 158.1} -- na janayet |
T11arhebt_u:4255: tādṛśasya hy anyato bhāve sa eva tajjananasvabhāvo nāgnyādisāmagrīti tajjananasvabhāvavikalā kathaṃ taṃ janayet ? |
T11arhebt_u:4257: yathā sāmagryantaram atajjananasvabhāvābhimataṃ [S. 151b.] na janayati tadvad
T11arhebt_u:4259: tathā hi -- sā ātmīyaṃ svabhāvam anusṛtyaiva
T11arhebt_u:4269: dhūmajanyasvabhāvo[598]'pi yathā sa eva dhūma indhanajanyasvabhāvo 'gnijanyasvabhāvaś cobhayato [T. 318b.] bhavati |
T11arhebt_u:4270: tathā tādṛśo 'pi dhūma ubhayasāmagrījanyasvabhāvatayobhayato bhaviṣyatīty ata āha -- na ca
T11arhebt_u:4271: dhūmasya tādṛśasya tadatajjanyaḥ agnyādisāmagrījanyo dhūmajanyaś ca svabhāvo yuktaḥ yuktyā saṅgatāḥ |
T11arhebt_u:4274: na hi tasya kālabhede 'pi tādṛgrūpatā bhidyate |bhede hy anyādṛśasyānyādṛśād bhāve vivādāyogāt
T11arhebt_u:4275: tasya yadi tādṛśātādṛśakāraṇajanyatā syāt tatas tādṛśātādṛśasvabhāvataiva syāt |
T11arhebt_u:4276: tad eva darśayann āha -- dhūmā'dhūma ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:4283: tādṛśātādṛśatayā 'sya bhavato dhūmādhūma[svabhāva]s tādṛśātādṛśasvabhāvaḥ syāt kutas tādṛśa eva? |
T11arhebt_u:4284: kuta etat? ity āha -- kāryasvabhāvānām ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:4285: kāryāṇāṃ hi ye svabhāvāḥ parasparāsaṃbhavinaḥ te parasparavilakṣaṇakāraṇasāmagrīsvabhāvakṛtā na svābhāvikā ahetukatvaprasaṅgāt |
T11arhebt_u:4287: {p. 159.1.} syānmatam -- naiva tādṛśātādṛśasvabhāvatāyāṃ tādṛśātādṛśakāraṇāpekṣā, kāryāṇām utpattimātra eva ^6kāraṇāpekṣaṇād ity
T11arhebt_u:4290: na hi tādṛśātādṛśasvabhāvayor abhūtvā bhāvavyatirekeṇānyā kācidutpattiḥ
T11arhebt_u:4294: tatra kāraṇāpekṣopagame kathaṃ tādṛśātādṛśatāyāṃ kāraṇāpekṣā na syāt |
T11arhebt_u:4295: tasmāt sāmagrīṇāṃ tādṛśātādṛśatvād eva kāryāṇāṃ tādṛśātādṛśasvabhāvavibhāga iti kuto 'nyādṛśāt tādṛśasambhavaḥ? iti |
T11arhebt_u:4296: yat tūktaṃ `yathaiko dhūmo 'gnīndhanābhyāṃ vilakṣaṇābhyāṃ janyate tathaikalakṣaṇam api kāryaṃ vilakṣaṇād api sāmagryantarād bhaviṣyati' iti
T11arhebt_u:4298: yato nāsmābhir vilakṣaṇānāṃ janakatvaṃ vāryate janayanty eva parasparavilakṣaṇā api svahetupariṇāmopanidhidharmāṇas tadavasthāniyatāḥ tad ekaṃ kāryaṃ, tasya tu teṣāṃ ca parasparāpekṣayā [T.
T11arhebt_u:4299: 319b.] janyajanakasvabhāvatāniyamāt tādṛśasya tādṛśād eva janmocyate nānyādṛśāt, tasyātajjananasvabhāvatvāt, tadabhāve 'py anyato bhavatas tadutpattiniyamābhāvāt |
T11arhebt_u:4301: yadi tv agnir ivendhanopādānopakṛtas tadupādānopākṛtaṃ cendhanam iva tadavasthāniyatam atādṛśam api ^2dhūmādikaṃ tādṛśaṃ[603]dhūmaṃ janayet pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ ca tathā 'vagamyeta tadā 'gnyādivat so 'pi
T11arhebt_u:4303: tadabhāve[604]'pi tu tādṛśasya bhāve tayor janyajanakasvabhāvatāniyamābhāvāt kutaḥ kāryakāraṇatety ahetutaiva tādṛśasyānyādṛśād bhavataḥ syāt |
T11arhebt_u:4305: 'gnīndhanādisāmagrīviśeṣo mantavyo yaḥ ādyadhūmajanano nānyaḥ sa dhūma
T11arhebt_u:4306: ādyo yaḥ agnyādisāmagrīviśeṣeṇa janito nānya {p. 160.1} iti kṛtvā kāryakāraṇayor evaṃ yathoktena nyāyena janyajanakarūpasya svabhāvasya
T11arhebt_u:4307: ^4niyamād yādṛśaṃ yasya[605]karaṇam ekadā pratyakṣānupalambhābhyām evāvadhāritaṃ tadvijātīyāt tato 'nyādṛśāt kāraṇāt utpattiḥ tādṛśasya [S.
T11arhebt_u:4308: 153b.] kāryasya na bhavati anyādṛśasya eva na vāryata iti |
T11arhebt_u:4309: tad evaṃ tādṛśātādṛśakāraṇakṛtakatvaṃ tādṛśātādṛśakāryasvabhāvasya pratipādyopasaṃharann āha -- tat tasmāt yādṛśaṃ [T. 320a.] kāryaṃ yādṛśāt kāraṇāt dṛṣṭaṃ pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ niścitam ekadā tat tan na vyabhicarati tādṛśam anyādṛśān na bhavati |
T11arhebt_u:4310: yanaivaṃ tena kāraṇena siddhe kāryakāraṇabhāve tādṛśasya kāryasya tādṛśam eva kāraṇam iti niścaye sati yathoditena nyāyena kāryasya kāraṇena vyāptir anvayavyatirekarūpā siddhābhavati na vijātīyād utpattir iti dṛṣṭakāraṇavijātīyāt kāraṇād anyādṛśān notpattir ity amum artham apratipadyamānaḥ kāryasya {na (? s. p. xxxv)}
T11arhebt_u:4311: vijātīyāt kāraṇān notpattir ity ayam atrārtho 'bhimata iti manvānaḥ paraś
T11arhebt_u:4312: codayann āha -- nanu svato vijātīyād api kāraṇāt kiñcit kāryaṃ bhavad dṛṣṭaṃtat [S. 154a.] kathaṃ na vijātīyād utpattir ity asya na dṛṣṭavirodhaḥ syāt |
T11arhebt_u:4313: kathaṃ yathā[606]ity āha -- tad yathāgomayādeḥ ādigrahaṇāt śṛṅgacandrakāntādeḥ śālūkādi ādigrahaṇāc charodakādi |
T11arhebt_u:4314: tathā hi -- gomayāc chālūkasya bhāvaḥ śṛṅgāc charasya candrakāntādapām |
T11arhebt_u:4315: na ca gomayādikaṃ śālūkāder na vijātīyam tat kim ucyate na vijātīyād utpattiḥ iti |
T11arhebt_u:4316: siddhāntavādī parasya bhrāṃtatāṃ darśayann āha -- na vijātīyād utpattiḥ iti |
T11arhebt_u:4317: yato hi kāraṇād yad bhavad dṛṣṭaṃ tat tato 'nyādṛśyān na bhavati ity ayam atrārtho vivakṣitaḥ, na tu kāryavijātīyād iti |
T11arhebt_u:4319: tad āha -- tathāvidham eva hi gomayādirūpaṃ tādṛśāṃ śāla{ū}kādīnām[608]ādinimittaṃ śālūkādiprabandhasya^7 ya ādiḥ prathama ārambhakṣaṇaḥ tasya kāraṇam iti kṛtvā śālūkādipabandhasyāder^7 na
T11arhebt_u:4322: yadā tu prabandhena pūrvakṣaṇanimittānām uttarottarakṣaṇānāṃ santānenotpattilakṣaṇā vṛttir bhavati śarasya tadā
T11arhebt_u:4323: ^1śarād bhāvaḥ[609]| tad evaṃ yasya prabandhādeḥ śṛṅgādibhyo bhāvo na tādṛśasya śarādeḥ yasya ca [S. 154b.] śarādes taduttarottarasya bhāvo na tādṛśasya ^2śṛṅgāder iti[610]na dṛṣṭakāraṇavijātīyāt kāraṇāt tādṛśasya
T11arhebt_u:4327: gomayādibhyaḥ keṣāñcidbhāve 'pi tādṛśatvābhāvān na vyabhicāra iti darśayann āha -- asti ca ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:4328: yasya śālūkasantānasya gomayādi kāraṇaṃ yasya ca sarvadā svajātinimittatvaṃ tayor gomayetarajanmanoḥ śālūkayor asty eva svabhāvabhedaḥ parasparam anyādṛśatvaṃ rūpasyābhede 'pi sati |
T11arhebt_u:4329: tulyākāratve sati katham anyādṛśatvam? iti cet,[h15]āha -- na hi ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:4330: yasmān nākāratulyataiva bhāvānāṃ tattve tādṛśatve nimittam yato gomayetarajanmanoḥ śālūkayor ākārasāmyāt tādṛśatvam eva syān na jātibhedaḥ
T11arhebt_u:4331: | kuta etat ? ity āha -- abhinnākārāṇām api ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:4332: yeṣām api hi samānākāratā [S. 155a.] keṣāñcid bhāvānāṃ teṣām api yata ākārād anyato [T.
T11arhebt_u:4333: 321a.] viśeṣāj jātibhedo dṛśyate tato nākārasāmyam eva jāty ekatve nibandhanam |
T11arhebt_u:4334: tathā hi -- ākārasāmye 'pi kvacit puṣpād bhedo dṛśyate nīletarakusumayor iva sūryayoḥ, kvacit phalāt vandhyetarayor iva
T11arhebt_u:4335: karkkoṭakyoḥ, kvacid rasād van{dh}yetarayor iva trapuṣayoḥ, kvacid gandhād vṛkṣetaraprabhavayor iva campakayoḥ, kvacit prabhāvāt sparśopayogasraṃsinyor iva haritakyor iti |
T11arhebt_u:4336: tasmād ākārasāmyanibandhanaṃ yady api `tad evedam' iti pratyabhijñānaṃ sajātīyatāṃ gomayetarajanmanoḥ śālūkayor upakalpayati tathāpi vilakṣaṇasāmagrījanyatayā tayor jātibheda
T11arhebt_u:4338: tata eva pratyabhijñānasya bhrāntatayā tatkalpitasya tādṛśatvasyālīkatvāt |
T11arhebt_u:4355: yadi punar gomayetarādijanmanaḥ śālūkāder agnidhūmādijanmano vā dhūmādeḥ pratyabhijñāvaśād vilakṣaṇasāmagrīnibandhanatve 'pi
T11arhebt_u:4356: samānasvabhāvataiva syāt ko doṣaḥ syāt? ity ata āha -- anyathā hi ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:4357: yadi [S. 155b.] hi yā svajāti[lakṣaṇapratyayāntarasahitā sāmagrī yā ca]
T11arhebt_u:4358: svajātinirapekṣā gomayādirūpā śālūkādeḥ, dhūmasya vā yā
T11arhebt_u:4360: avi(-kā tasyāḥ vi)lakṣaṇāyā api sāmagryā avilakṣaṇam tādṛśam eva kāryaṃ
T11arhebt_u:4361: dhūmaśālūkādikam utpadyeta tadā na `kāraṇasya' sāmagrīrūpasya bhedābhedābhyāṃ vailakṣaṇyāvailakṣaṇyābhyāṃ kāryasya bhedābhedau vailakṣaṇyāvailakṣaṇye tajjātīyavijātīyātmake syātām iti kṛtvā viśvasya
T11arhebt_u:4362: sakalasya padārtharāśeḥ ahetukau bhedābhedau sajātīyavijātīyatve syātām |
T11arhebt_u:4363: tasmād yatra vilakṣaṇā sāmagrī tatra kutaścit sāmyāt sarūpatve 'pi
T11arhebt_u:4366: vidvāṃsaḥ, atadrūpaparāvṛtter ubhayatra samāntatvāt, naiṣa doṣaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:4375: agurukarpūracandanādijātibhedam anukurvanty eva [T. 322a.] taddhūmāḥ, kās aśvāsādiharadravyanirmitavarttibhedaṃ ca taddhūmāḥ,
T11arhebt_u:4376: tadrasavīryavipākānuvidhānāt[614]| na cākārānyatayā[615]vijātīyatvam, yato nākārā 'bhedabhedanibandhane sajātīyavijātīyatve |
T11arhebt_u:4381: tasmād indhanam eva tasyopādānakāraṇam agnyādisahakāripratyayāhitaviśeṣaṃ tathāvidhaṃ dhūmakāryamaṅgārādi bhinnākṛti janyatīty alam atiprasaṅgena |
T11arhebt_u:4382: nanu ca yadi nāma sāmagrībhede 'pi kāryasya bhedo na jātaḥ tadā kāraṇabhede saty api tasyābhāvāt tasyāhetukatā 'stu, abhedasya tu kim
T11arhebt_u:4383: āyātam? yenobhayor ahetukatvam ucyata ity ata āha -- tathāhi ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:4384: yadā hi sāmagrībhede [S. 156b.] saty api kāryasya bhedo na jāta iti tasyāhetukatvam -- na hi hetau saty abhavataḥ kathañcid api hetumattopapadyate -- tadā yo 'py asāv ^5abhedaḥ kāryasya[616]so sāmagryoḥ[617]^7bhinnatvād asaty abhede[618]jāta iti kutas tasyāpi
T11arhebt_u:4386: yathā hi hetau saty abhavato na hetumattā tathā hetāv asaty api bhavato hetumattā kutaḥ syāt?
T11arhebt_u:4388: na iti cet; na tarhy ayaṃ bhedaḥ kvacit padam ābadhnīyāt, śālīkodravāder api [T. 322b.] hetubhedasyābhedahetutvān nimittam antareṇa kalpanāyāṃ viśeṣābhāvāt |
T11arhebt_u:4389: pratibhāsābhedasya ca kutaścid bhrāntinimittāt paramārthato bhede 'py upalakṣaṇāt |
T11arhebt_u:4390: syād etat -- yo hy atādṛśād api tādṛśodbhavam icchati tasya bhedābhedayor ahetukatvam iṣṭam eva bhāvā eva kevalaṃ
T11arhebt_u:4391: hetumanta ity ata āha -- tadvyatiriktaśca ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:4392: na hi bhedābhedavyatiriktaḥ kaścid bhāvānāṃ svabhāvo 'sti yas tayor ahetukatve
T11arhebt_u:4396: ananyatve 'pi bhedābhedayor bhāvasvabhāvasya ca svātmanyevāvasthānāt anupakārāc ca kutaḥ sambandhitā?
T11arhebt_u:4397: upakārakalpanāyāṃ ca yadi bhāvasvabhāvaḥ svahetubhya[620]eva na kutaścid bhinno 'bhinno vā samutpanna itīṣyate, tadā tadbhāve[621]'pi svabhāvānyathātvābhāvāt kuto bhinnābhinnatā bhāvasvabhāvasya syāt? |
T11arhebt_u:4399: vyatiriktabhedābhedavaśād bhedābhedau svabhāvaḥ pratipadyeta, tāv api yadi
T11arhebt_u:4400: bhinnau tadā bhāvasvabhāvas tadavastha eveti na tasya kutaścit svarūpato bhedo 'bhedo vā syāt
T11arhebt_u:4401: punas tadvaśād bhedābhedakalpanāyāṃ bhāvasvabhāvasya tadavasthaṃ tādavasthyam anavasthā [T. 323a.] ca bhedābhedayoḥ |
T11arhebt_u:4402: athābhinnau tadā bhāvasvabhāva eva bhedābhedābhyāṃ kriyata iti syāt, tasya rūpāntareṇa karaṇāsambhā(bha)vāt; tasya ca hetvantarāt
T11arhebt_u:4404: na ca bhāvasvabhāvaḥ kriyate, tasya svahetor eva nirvṛtteḥ |
T11arhebt_u:4405: svahetubhya eva bhāvasvabhāvasya kutaścid bhinnābhinnātmana utpattikalpanāyāṃ vā bhedābhedayor
T11arhebt_u:4406: vayarthyam; [S. 157b.] bhedābhedabuddher api tata eva siddheḥ |
T11arhebt_u:4407: tasmādvaiśeṣikādikalpitayor bhedābhedayor viśeṣasāmānyātmanor[622]ayogāt bhāvasvabhāva eva bhedābhedaśabdavācyaḥ
T11arhebt_u:4409: tato bhāvānām ahetukatvān nityaṃ sattvam asattvaṃ vā syāt |
T11arhebt_u:4410: ahetukatve hi bhāvānāṃ yadi kadācit sattvaṃ sarvadaiva syāt |
T11arhebt_u:4411: atha kadācid asattvaṃ tad api sarvadā syāt |
T11arhebt_u:4415: yasmād apekṣayāhi tasyāpekṣaṇīyasya hetor bhāve bhavanto 'bhāve ca na bhavantaḥ kādācitkāḥ kadācid bhavā yujyante, nānyatheti |
T11arhebt_u:4416: tasmān na vilakṣaṇāt kāraṇāt avilakṣaṇasya kāryasyotpattir abhyupagantavyā, yathoktena nyāyenāhetukatvādiprasaṅgāt
T11arhebt_u:4417: punar api vilakṣaṇāyāḥ sāmagryāḥ [T. 323b.] avilakṣaṇasya kāryasyotpattau doṣāntaram āha -- vyavasthāvāṃśca pratiniyataḥ sādhyeṣu
T11arhebt_u:4418: ghaṭapaṭādiṣu sādhanānāṃ mṛttantvādīnāṃ loke yo niyogo ghaṭārthī mṛtpiṇḍam eva tatra niyuṅkte na tantūn, paṭārthī ca tantūn eva na mṛtpiṇḍam
T11arhebt_u:4421: sāmagrīṇāṃ yāḥ śaktayaḥ -- ātmātiśayalakṣaṇās tāsāṃ pratiniyame kācid eva sāmagrī {p. 165.1} kvacid eva kārye upayujyate nānyā 'nyatrety evaṃrūpe hi yasmāt kiñcid eva mṛdādikaṃ kasyacid eva ghaṭādeḥ sādhanāyopādīyate nāparaṃ tadvilakṣaṇaṃ tantvādikam kasmād evam? iti cet? tasyaiva mṛdādeḥ tatra ghaṭādau śakter yogyatvāt anyasya tantvādes tatrāśakteḥ |
T11arhebt_u:4422: kasmāt tasyaiva tatra śaktir nānyasya ity ata āha tayoḥ mṛdādes tantvādeś ca tajjananasvabhāvatvena ghaṭādijananasvabhāvatvena itarasvabhāvatvena ca ghaṭādyajananasvabhāvena ca bhedāt anyatvabhāvāt na hi mṛttantvādirūpatāto 'nyad eva tajjananetarasvabhāvatvaṃ nāma |
T11arhebt_u:4423: yadā tu sāmagrīṇāṃ parasparavilakṣaṇānām api śaktipratiniyamo neṣyate vilakṣaṇād api avilakṣaṇakāryopagamāt [T. 324a.] tadā tajjananasvabhāvavilakṣaṇād api
T11arhebt_u:4424: dhūmādijananasvabhāvaṃ yat kāraṇam agnīndhanādisāmagrīlakṣaṇaṃ tadvilakṣaṇād api śakramūrddhādeḥ kṣaṇāśrayeṇa vā dhūmādes tasyāgnīndhanādisāmagrījanyasya dhūmasya tatlakṣaṇasya cotpattāv iṣyamāṇāyāṃ na tajjananaśakteḥpratiniyamo vivakṣitadhūmādikāryajananaśaktipratiniyamaḥ |
T11arhebt_u:4425: iti tasmād yat kiñcit kāryaṃ yataḥkutaścit kāraṇāt syāt utpadyeta, na ^4yathādṛṣṭam eva
T11arhebt_u:4428: tato vilakṣaṇasāmagrījanmanaḥ kāryasya kutaścit sāmyāt sarūpasyopalakṣaṇe 'py
T11arhebt_u:4430: syānmatam -- vilakṣaṇāyā api sāmagryās tallakṣaṇakāryajananaśaktiḥ samāneti tallakṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ bhaviṣyati kasyāścid eva ca tathābhāvān na yathoditadoṣāvasara ity ata āha tajjananaśaktisāmye tu ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:4431: uktam eva tāvad atra pūrvapakṣe `na ca dhūmasya tadatajjanyasvabhāvaḥ' ityādikaṃ dūṣaṇam |
T11arhebt_u:4433: 324b.] śaktiḥ ātmātiśayas tādṛśyeva śakramūrddhno[627]{p. 166.1} dhūmasya vā yadi tatsāmagrījanyadhūmāvilakṣaṇakāryajananaśaktir ātmātiśayalakṣaṇā tadā tacchaktisāmye tadevāgnīndhanādikam evārthān nāmāntareṇoktaṃ syāt,
T11arhebt_u:4435: sa eva hy agnir ya indhanavikāramādadhāno dhūmaṃ janayati, tac cendhanaṃ yadagninā
T11arhebt_u:4437: yadi [S. 159a.] ca śakramūrddhāder api evaṃ bhavatā 'bhyupagamyate tadā kevalaṃ nāmni vivādaḥ
T11arhebt_u:4438: syāt, arthābhedam abhyupagamya tathābhidhānāt yata evam iti tasmāt kāryaṃ dhūmādikaṃ dṛṣṭam ekadā pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ niścitam atadrūpavyāvṛttenātmanā kāraṇam indhanādikaṃ santānāpekṣayā kṣaṇāpekṣayā vā na vyabhicarati tadvilakṣaṇād anyato na bhavatīti kāryahetāv anvayavyatirekaniścayaḥ sidhyatīti |[628]
T11arhebt_u:4458: [628] T. adds brāhmaṇācatena viracite hetubinduprakaraṇe kāryahetvadhikāro dvitīyaḥ |
T11arhebt_u:4459: tad evaṃ kāryahetau yato yadbhavadṛṛṣṭaṃsakṛt pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃtādṛśasya sarvasya tathāvidhād eva janma na tadvijātīyād ity ekasyā [T. 325a.] api kāryavyakteḥ kutaścid bhāvadarśane
T11arhebt_u:4461: anupalabdhau tu yathoktāyāṃ nimittāntarābhāvopadarśananibandhanayor nānvayavyatirekayor vipratipattiḥ
T11arhebt_u:4466: pratiṣedhyaviṣayajñānaviṣayarūpeṇāpariṇāmas HBṬĀ 380.28f.] ātmanaḥ tadanyavastuviṣayaṃ vijñānam eva vā 'bhāvasya gamakaṃ pratyakṣānumānābhyaṃ pramāṇāntaram āhurmmīmāṃsakāḥ| na hy anyavastuviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣānumānātmakam abhāvaṃ pratipadyate, tasya bhāvāṃśaviṣayatvāt,
T11arhebt_u:4468: abhāvāṃśe[: bhāvāṃśa (abhāvāṃśe) janayad iti HBṬĀ 381.3] tu nāstīti jñānaṃ janayat tadabhāvapramāṇākhyaṃ
T11arhebt_u:4471: anyabhāvalakṣaṇāṃ tajjñānalakṣaṇām[629]vā 'nupalabdhim abhāvasyaiva sādhanam āhur nābhāvavyavahārasya, anupalabdher liṅgād abhāvasiddhau
T11arhebt_u:4472: svayam eva tadvyavahārapravṛtteḥ |naiyāyikās tu nāstīti jñānam eva kevalapradeśādigrāhijñānānantarabhāvipratyakṣaṃ na pramāṇāntaram abhāvasya tuccharūpasya paricchedātmakam ācakṣate tad evāsya [T. 325b.] ghaṭādeḥ pratiṣedhyasyānupalabdhiśabdena yady ucyate na kaścid virodhaḥ iti |
T11arhebt_u:4473: tad evam anupalabdhau bhedaṃ gatā buddhayaḥ prativādinām iti [S. 160a.]
T11arhebt_u:4474: tannirāsārtham anupalabdhisvarūpaṃ tāvad upadarśayann āha upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya ityādi
T11arhebt_u:4477: yaḥ svabhāvaḥ satsv anyeṣūpalambhapratyayeṣu san pratyakṣa eva bhavatī'ty
T11arhebt_u:4480: te hy anupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptiśabdena mahattvānekadravyavattvarūpāṇi dravyāṇām āhuḥ |
T11arhebt_u:4481: mahattvād[: mahatīti HBṬĀ 382.7] anekadravyavattvād rūpāc copalabdhiḥ [VaiSū IV.1.6.] iti vacanāt[: evaṃ vacanād ity HBṬĀ 382.8] |
T11arhebt_u:4482: evaṃcopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdhiḥ saty api vastuni sambhavatīty asadvyavahārasiddhāv anaikāntikīty ācakṣate |
T11arhebt_u:4483: na hi cākṣuṣasyāpi raśmer mahattvānekadravyavattvarūpāṇy upalambhakāni bhavanti |
T11arhebt_u:4488: abhāve hetuḥ'[632][ Durveka: bhāṣyakāra is nyāyabhāṣyakāra pakṣilasvāmī
T11arhebt_u:4490: indriyatvāt tvagādivat kila prāpyakāri cakṣur ity anumānataś cākṣuṣo raśmir upalabhyate tasya [S. 160b.] pratyakṣato
T11arhebt_u:4495: yadāhy upalambhapratyayāntarasākalyaṃ svabhāvaviśeṣaś ca yathokta upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptir ucyate na mahattvādikaṃ tadā kuto
T11arhebt_u:4498: na hi rūpādivyatiriktaṃ dravyaṃ tatpratibhāsavivekinā ''kārāntareṇa svajñāne pratibhāsate
T11arhebt_u:4499: na cāpratibhāsamānam anātmarūpavivekinā rūpeṇa pratyakṣatām anubhavaty atiprasaṅgāt |
T11arhebt_u:4501: na ca svarūpeṇāmahataḥ tatsambandhe 'py asya mahattāsambhavaḥ |
T11arhebt_u:4507: na ca mahattvaṃ rūpaṃ vā dravyodayakāle 'bhyupagamyate, yato dravyaṃ guṇasya samavāyikāraṇam iṣyate |
T11arhebt_u:4508: tac ca pratilabdhātmakam eva tathātām anubhavatīti prathame kṣaṇe dravyaṃ nirguṇam eva |
T11arhebt_u:4509: na cāsya[asya : svasya HBṬĀ 382.13] dvitīye kṣaṇe prāktanarūpatyāgo 'sti rūpāntaraṃ vā ''virbhavati yataḥ{p. 169.1}
T11arhebt_u:4515: na caitat kṣaṇikatve sambhavati akṣaṇikatve vā prāg 'nādhārasya paścādādhārābhāvaḥ|
T11arhebt_u:4516: samavāyikāraṇāsambhavād evānekadravyavattvam apy asambhavi yasmād anekaṃ dravyam ārambhakaṃ samavāyikāraṇātmanā yasya vidyate tad evaṃvyapadiśyate
T11arhebt_u:4518: sattve 'pi mahattvāder neyam upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptir asmākam abhimatā |
T11arhebt_u:4520: tayopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdhir asadvyavahārasiddhāv anaikāntikīti śāstrakāro darśayām babhūva [S. 161b.] upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya yā anupalabdhiḥ kāraṇasya vyāpakasya vā pratiṣedhyād anyasya sā abhāvahetuḥ kāryasya vyāpyasya ca abhāvavyavahārahetuśca |
T11arhebt_u:4523: yā tv anupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdhiḥ pratyakṣānumānanivṛttilakṣaṇā sā saṃśayahetuḥ pramāṇanivṛttāv apy arthābhāvāsiddheḥ, nimittābhāvāt tu sadvyavahārapratiṣedhahetur ity avagantavyam |
T11arhebt_u:4527: [631] nyāyasūtrabhāṣyakṛc cānvayaḥ [632] atra nyāyasūtram -- nānumīyamānasya pratyakṣato
T11arhebt_u:4535: tatra ye tāvad upalabdhyabhāvamātram anupalabdhim icchanti,
T11arhebt_u:4536: vijñānaṃvā'nyavastuni [ŚlV abhāvapariccheda 11d.] iti vacanāt tadanyavastuvijñānam eva vā, tannirāsārthaṃ [T. 327a.]
T11arhebt_u:4537: jñātṛ-jñeyadharmalakṣaṇām anupalabdhiṃ darśayitum upalabdhim eva tāvad dvividhām darśayann āha -- atra anupalabdhivākye yopalabdhiḥ śrūyate kriyārūpā sā yadā kartṛsthatayā 'pekṣyate tadā tasyā upalabhamānasya
T11arhebt_u:4538: kartuḥ dharmatve apekṣyamāṇe tajjñānam upalabhamānasya yajjñānaṃ tad upalabdhir ucyate |
T11arhebt_u:4539: upalabhamānaś ca buddhīndriyadehakalāpa eva ca pūrvakṣaṇasaṅgṛhīta[636]upalabdhijanaka ucyate |
T11arhebt_u:4540: tathā hi -- upalabdher janaka āśrayo vā karttā parair ucyate |
T11arhebt_u:4541: na {p. 170.1} cendriyāder anyasya janakatvaṃ [S. 162a.] sambhavati yato 'nvayavyatirekanibandhanaḥ
T11arhebt_u:4542: kāryakāraṇabhāvavyavahāraḥ, tau cānvayavyatirekau nendriyāder anyasya sambhavataḥ satsv indriyādiṣu niyamenopalabdher bhāvāt |
T11arhebt_u:4543: yadi hīndriyādiṣu satsv api kadācid upalabdhir nopajāyate tadā satsv apy anyeṣu sakaleṣu hetuṣu kāryānutpattiḥ kāraṇāntaravaikalyaṃ sūcayatīti tadvyatiriktakāraṇāntaraṃ parikalpyeta |
T11arhebt_u:4544: na caitad asti, tat katham ātmanas tadutpattau nimittabhāvo[637]'bhyupagamyeta? atiprasaṅgāt
T11arhebt_u:4546: ^3yasmin sati bhavaty eva yat tato 'nyasya kalpane |
T11arhebt_u:4547: taddhetutvena sarvatra hetūnām anavasthitiḥ[638]|| [PV I 26] iti |
T11arhebt_u:4548: āśrayatvam api janakasyaiveti tad apy ātmano na sambhavati |
T11arhebt_u:4549: sthāpakatvād āśraya iti cet; na, kṣāṇikatve sthiter abhāvād upalabdher akṣaṇikatve 'pi svayam evāvināśād avasthānāt |
T11arhebt_u:4550: tathā hi -- upalabdher avināśa eva sthitir ucyate na pātābhāvaḥ [T. 327b.] tasyā gurutvābhāvāt saṃyogābhāvena gurutvāt patanam [VSū V.1.7.] iti capareṣāṃkṛtāntaḥ |
T11arhebt_u:4551: samavāyād[639]āśraya iti cet; nanu so 'pi ādhāryādhārabhūtānām eveṣyate |
T11arhebt_u:4552: na cāpatanadharmikāyā upalabdher ādhāreṇa kiṃcit, [S. 162b.] samavāyāc cāśrayatve 'nyasyāpi tadbhāvaprasaṅgaḥ, tasya sarvātmasu samānatvāt,
T11arhebt_u:4554: kramayaugapadyābhyām arthakriyāvirodhāc ca nāsyātmanaḥ sattvam, tato 'sya kuto janakatvam? āśrayatvaṃ vā? ity alaṃ kṣuṇṇakṣodīkaraṇeneti |
T11arhebt_u:4555: evam upalabdhim ādarśyānupalabdhim ādarśayann āha -- tasmād upalabdhijñānād anyā vastvantaraviṣayā upalabdhiḥ jñānātmikā anupalabdhiḥ
T11arhebt_u:4556: | kathaṃ punar upalabdhir evānupalabhdir ucyate? ity āha -- vivakṣitetyādi
T11arhebt_u:4559: yathā ca sparśanīyāsparśanīyādhikāre vivakṣitāt sparśanīyād anyatvād `asparśanīyaś
T11arhebt_u:4564: paryudāsena pratiṣedhyasyārthasya varjanena yā viśiṣṭe 'rthe vṛttis tayā, nañaḥ
T11arhebt_u:4566: prādhānyaṃ pratiṣedho 'rthagṛhītaḥ vidhibhāk svapadena nocyate ekavākyatā ca tatra paryudāsavṛttitā
T11arhebt_u:4568: anyopalabdhir bhavati' ity evaṃ vākyenānyopalabdher vidhānāt [T. 328a.]
T11arhebt_u:4570: vivakṣitopalabdher anivarttane tadapekṣayā 'nyasyā vidhānāyogāt svapadena nañā vidhibhāṅ nocyate |
T11arhebt_u:4572: anyaśabdena paryudāsāśrayeṇā 'nyaśabdasyaiva vākye prayogāt anyā upalabdhir anupalabdhir iti |
T11arhebt_u:4573: nañaś ca subantena sāmarthyaṃ na tiṅantena ity ekavākyatvaṃ `na upalabdhir
T11arhebt_u:4576: tatra hi pratiṣedhasya prādhānyaṃ vidhir arthād gamyate vākyabhedaḥ svapadena nañā pratiṣedhabhāk sambadhyate |
T11arhebt_u:4577: tad evaṃ jñātṛdharmalakṣaṇām anupalabdhiṃ vyākhyāya jñeyadharmalakṣaṇāṃ pratipādayann āha -- upalabhyamānadharmatva ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:4578: yadā karmasthakriyāpekṣayopalabhyamānasya vastuno dharma upalabdhir vivakṣyate tadā viṣayasvabhāva upalabdhir mantavyā |
T11arhebt_u:4581: pratiṣedhyasya ghaṭāder yadātmaviṣayaṃ vijñānaṃ tajjanane yā yogyatā tallakṣaṇo viṣayasvabhāva upalabdhiśabdenocyate |
T11arhebt_u:4584: tathā hi yogyatā dharmaḥ, dharmadharmiṇoś ca bheda eva ity ata āha -- yogyatāyāḥ ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:4586: bhāvarūpaiva na vastusvarūpād bhidyate, anyathā bhāvo yogya eva na syāt |
T11arhebt_u:4587: yogyatā 'syeti ca sambandho bhāvato na syāt |
T11arhebt_u:4589: tad evam upalabdher viṣayadharmatāṃ pratipādyānupalabdher api pratipādayann āha tasmād anyaḥ ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:4592: tadviparītaḥ svabhāvo ghaṭaviviktapradeśarūpaḥ sa eva cātrānupalabdhiśabdenocyate |
T11arhebt_u:4596: kathaṃ punar ayaṃ nañ anyārthavṛttiḥ sāmānyaśabdaḥ san ghaṭaviviktapradeśasya [S. 164a.] tajjñānasyaiva
T11arhebt_u:4597: ghaṭaviviktasyānupalabdhitvaṃ[643]paryudāsavṛttyā prakalpayati, na punar aviśeṣeṇa sarveṣām evānyaśabdavācyānām? ity ata āha -- yatra yasmin ityādi
T11arhebt_u:4598: | yatra deśe kāla 'vasthāyāṃ vā 'vyavadhānādilakṣaṇāyām, yasmin pradeśarūpādau upalabhyamāne niyamena avaśyaṃtayā yasyānyasya padārthasya ghaṭrarūpāder upalabdhir bhavati sa ghaṭarūpādiḥ padārthaḥ tatsaṃsṛṣṭaḥ tena pradeśarūpādinā saṃsṛṣṭaḥ |
T11arhebt_u:4602: yadā hi pradeśarūpaṃ vyavadhānaviprakarṣādirahitaṃ vijñāne svākāraṃ samarppayati tadā ghaṭarūpam api tatra[644]tathāvidhaṃ svākāraṃ samarppayaty eva |
T11arhebt_u:4603: yadi nāma yogyatā tasya tena tulyā svasvabhāvavyavasthites tu kathaṃ tatsaṃsṛṣṭatā?
T11arhebt_u:4605: ekatra hi jñāne dvāv api tau svākāradvāreṇa saṃsṛṣṭau na sākṣāt, tadvijñānaṃ padārthadvayākāram ājāyamānaṃ tayor ātmani saṃsarggaṃ darśayati |
T11arhebt_u:4606: kim iti punas tat jñānaṃ padārthadvayākāram avaśyaṃ [S. 164b.] bhavati yatas tayor jñānadvārakaḥ
T11arhebt_u:4607: saṃsarggaḥ? ity ata āha -- tayoḥsatoḥ ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:4608: yāv etau tulyayogyatārūpau tau yadi santau bhavatas tadā naivaikākāraniyatā pratipattir bhavati
T11arhebt_u:4610: na hy eṣa sambhavo 'sti -- yat tulyayogyatārūpayor eka eva pratibhāseta nāpara iti |
T11arhebt_u:4614: na cānubhavaviruddham ācakṣaṇā viduṣām avadheyavacaso bhavanti |
T11arhebt_u:4617: karaṇadharma evāyaṃ yad ekasminn eva karmaṇi kriyāṃ niṣpādayati nānekatra, karaṇaṃ cendriyaṃ tato nānekapratipattihetur iti cet, kathaṃ pradīpādir anekatra bahūnāṃ pratipattijanakaḥ? kartṛbhedād adoṣa iti cet; karttrekatvāt tarhi kriyaikatra karmāṇīti kathaṃ `karaṇadharmaḥ' ityādi vaco na plavate? |
T11arhebt_u:4618: na ca pratikṣaṇaviśarāruṣu bhāveṣu paramārthataḥ kartṛkaraṇādibhāvo [S. 165a.] yuktaḥ kriyā vā kācit
T11arhebt_u:4619: | na ca sarrvakārakānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyini kārye kasyacid atiśayo 'sti
T11arhebt_u:4620: yenāyaṃ karttā kā(ka)raṇaṃ cedam ityādi parikalpyeta |
T11arhebt_u:4621: tasmād aviśiṣṭayogyatayoḥ kuta ekarūpaniyatāyāḥ pratipatteḥ sambhavaḥ? iti siddha ekajñānasaṃsarggaḥ
T11arhebt_u:4623: na hy asati tulyayogyatārūpatve yugapad ekendriyajanitajñānapratibhāsitā rūparasavat sambhavatīti
T11arhebt_u:4625: ekam evendriyajñānam ājāyate' iti teṣāṃ mukhya evaikajñānasaṃsarggaḥ |
T11arhebt_u:4626: ye tu `tatrāpi pratyarthaṃ bhinnāny evaikendriyanimittāny ekakālāni tadviṣayāṇāṃ yugapat sannihitānāṃ svajñāneṣu sāmarthyāviśeṣāt,
T11arhebt_u:4627: ata[646]evaikatayā loke 'dhyavasīyamānāni jñānāny upajāyante` iti varṇayanti [T. 330a.] teṣām ekendriyajatvenaikāyatanaviṣayatvena caikakāleṣv ^3ekatvavyapadeśo loke[647]tathādhyavasāyād aupacārikaḥ |
T11arhebt_u:4628: yadi nāmaikajñānasaṃsarggāt tatsaṃsṛṣṭasyāpi [S. 165b.] sāmānyena sarvam anyam ayaṃ nañ kin na pratipādayati? iti ata āha -- tasmāt ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:4629: yasmād aviśiṣṭatvād yogyatāyā yathoktena prakāreṇaikatra jñāne dvayor api saṃsarggaḥ tasmād aviśiṣṭaṃ yogyatārūpaṃ yayoḥ tata evaikajñānasaṃsarggiṇau tau tasmāt tayor evaṃrūpayoḥ parasparāpekṣam eva na sarvānyapadārthāpekṣam anyatvam iha anupalabdhyadhikāre abhipretam |
T11arhebt_u:4630: loke tu yady aviśeṣapadārthāntarāpekṣam anyatvaṃ nañā kvacid ucyate vyāptinyāyasamāśrayāt, tathāpi tad iha na gṛhyate, {p. 174.1}
T11arhebt_u:4631: pratyāsatterāśrayaṇāt ekajñānasaṃsarggalakṣaṇā prattyāsattir āśrīyate nā 'nyā pramāṇacintādhikārāt anyathā 'nupalabdhir anaikāntikyeva syāt |
T11arhebt_u:4632: tasmāt tattvacintakais tathāvidham anyatvam āśrayaṇīyam yad anupalabdher avyabhicāranibandhanam
T11arhebt_u:4634: tad evam ekajñānasaṃsarggāpekṣayā 'nyatvaṃ pratipādyānupalabdhiṃ darśayann āha -- sa kevalaḥ ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:4635: sa eva yadā kevalaḥ pradeśo yathoktaghaṭāpekṣayā tasmād anya ucyate [S. 166a.] tadā ghaṭaviviktapradeśajñānaṃ [T. 330b.] vā 'nupalabdhiḥ, na tu yatheśvaraseno
T11arhebt_u:4637: ghaṭaviviktapradeśasvabhāvo vā; na tu tadviviktajñānam eva yathāhakumārilaḥvijñānaṃvānyavastuni [ŚlV abhāvapariccheda 11d.] iti |
T11arhebt_u:4638: yathā hy anyavastuviṣayaṃ jñānam anubhūyamānaṃ pratiyogismaraṇāpekṣaṃ tadabhāvavyavahāranibandhanaṃ tathā tadviviktaḥ pradeśo 'pi |
T11arhebt_u:4640: kasyacit pratipattuḥ `yataḥ kevalapradeśākāram eva jñānaṃ mayā saṃvedyate na tu ghaṭākāram api tasmād atra ghaṭo nāsti` iti evaṃ nāstitājñānam
T11arhebt_u:4641: utpadyate; kasyacit tu `yataḥ kevalaḥ pradeśo 'yaṃ dṛśyate na tu
T11arhebt_u:4642: ghaṭasahitaḥ tasmān nāsty atra ghaṭaḥ` ity evam |
T11arhebt_u:4643: tasmād ubhayor nāstitājñānajanmani tulyaṃ sāmarthyam iti dvayor api anupalabdhivyavasthā yukteti
T11arhebt_u:4645: kartṛsthakriyā 'pekṣayā yadā tatsvabhāvas tadā jñeyadharmalakṣaṇā karmasthakriyāpekṣayeti
T11arhebt_u:4646: evam anupalabdhiṃ [S. 166b.] paryudāsavṛttyā vyavasthāpya sādhyam asyā darśayann āha -- sāabhāvam ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:4648: 'pi [T. 331a.] pradeśādau dṛśyamāne yatra ghaṭādau pratiyoginy arthitvādibhiḥ smṛtir asya bhavati tasyābhāvaṃ sādhayati, abhāvavyavahāraṃ vā |
T11arhebt_u:4652: tatra `nāsty atra ghaṭaḥ` ity evam ākāraṃ
T11arhebt_u:4653: jñānam, evaṃvidhavastvabhidhāyakaṃ cābhidhānaṃ niḥśaṅkasya ca tatra pradeśe gamanāgamanalakṣaṇā pravṛttir iti |
T11arhebt_u:4656: tanmatanirāsārtham āha -- katham anyabhāva ityādi |īśvaraseno hi manyate -- kārya-svabhāvahetubhyāṃ bhāvarūpābhyāṃ anupalabdheḥ pṛthakkaraṇād
T11arhebt_u:4657: avaśyam abhāvarūpatvam asyāḥ, anyathā pṛthakkaraṇam anarthakam eva syāt |
T11arhebt_u:4658: tvayā [S. 167a.] cānyasya pratiṣedhyaviviktasya pradeśādes tajjñānasya vā bhāvarūpānupalabdhir ākhyāyate tannūnam anyabhāvas tadabhāvo yenaivam
T11arhebt_u:4660: na caitad yujyate, bhāvābhāvayor virodhād ekātmatānupapatter
T11arhebt_u:4662: kumārilo 'py evaṃ manyate -- yeyaṃ jñātṛ-jñeyadharmalakṣaṇā dvidhā
T11arhebt_u:4663: 'nupalabdhir abhāvarūpā tvayocyate tasyā bhavatu nāstitājñānaṃ prati
T11arhebt_u:4666: 331b.] pratiṣedhyajñānād anyasya vā tajjñānasya yo bhāvo bhāvāṃśaḥ sa katham abhāvaḥ? pratiṣedhyasya tajjñānasya vā katham abhāvāṃśaḥ? |
T11arhebt_u:4669: saty api dharmirūpeṇābhede tayoś codbhavābhibhavābhyāṃ grahaṇāgrahaṇavyavastheti |
T11arhebt_u:4671: dharmayor bheda iṣṭo hi dharmyabhede 'pi naḥsthite |
T11arhebt_u:4674: uktottaratām asya darśayann āha -- uktam uttaram atra codye yathā paryudāsavṛttyāapekṣātaḥ
T11arhebt_u:4678: na hi prasajyapratiṣedha evaiko nañarthaḥ kin tu paryudāso 'pi |
T11arhebt_u:4684: paramārthatas tu pratiṣedhyābhāvavyavahārayogyatā {p. 176.1} vastubhūtaiva pradeśasya sādhyata iti na svabhāvahetoḥ svabhāvānupalabdhir bhidyata[649]iti |
T11arhebt_u:4686: itīśvaraseno manyate tannirākurvann āha -- na pratiṣedhamātram ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:4687: kasmāt? ity āha -- tasya sādhanāsiddheḥ ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:4688: [T. 332a.] na hy abhāvasya sarvasāmarthyavirahalakṣaṇasya sādhanatvaṃ siddhihetutvaṃ
T11arhebt_u:4689: sidhyati, sarvasāmarthyaviraharūpasya tadayogāt[650]| hetutve vā kathaṃ na
T11arhebt_u:4693: tataś ca sādhakatvāyogād abhāvavyavahāra eva na sidhyet |
T11arhebt_u:4694: athavā tasya prasajyapratiṣedhātmana upalabdhyabhāvasya sādhanam eva kiñcin na sidhyatīti
T11arhebt_u:4695: sa hy abhāvatvād apareṇopalabdhyabhāvena sādhyaḥ syāt, so 'py apareṇety anavasthānam |
T11arhebt_u:4696: na cendriyavad ajñātasya pratiṣedhajñānahetutā, sadā sannihitatvenānapekṣitasahakāriṇo nityaṃ tadudayaprasaṅgāt |
T11arhebt_u:4697: idaṃ cārthadvayaṃ `katham abhāvaḥ kasyacit, pratipattiḥ pratipattihetur vā? |
T11arhebt_u:4698: tasyāpi kathaṃ pratipattiḥ` ity ^4atrāntare svayam eva vipañcayiṣyati[651]|
T11arhebt_u:4699: kumārilasyāpy uttaram āha -- tasya anyasya pratiyoginā
T11arhebt_u:4701: na hy asau vastvantaraiḥ saṃsṛṣṭasvabhāva ekarūpaḥ |
T11arhebt_u:4702: tathātve hy abhāvāṃśo 'pi na kvacit sidhyet |
T11arhebt_u:4703: tasyaivaṃvidhasya bhāvasiddhir eva bhāvāṃśasiddhir eva aparasya pratiyogino vastvantarasyābhāvasiddhir abhāvāṃśasya tvadabhimatasya siddhir astu bhāvāṃśasyaivābhāvāṃśarūpatopapatter iti manyate tathā hi -- abhāvāṃśo
T11arhebt_u:4706: sā ca bhāvāṃśasyāpi samāneti sa evābhāvo 'stu tannimittasya samānatvāt kim anyenābhāvāṃśopagatena?
T11arhebt_u:4710: 'pi anyasya vastuno bhāvo 'pi tvadabhimato bhāvāṃśo 'pi na kevalam abhāvāṃśas tvanmatyā 'bhāva iti vyapadiśyate 'smābhiḥ |
T11arhebt_u:4711: tato bhāvāṃśasyābhāvarūpatā saṅgataiveti na kiñcid virudhyata iti |
T11arhebt_u:4712: yad uktaṃ `jñātṛ-jñeyadharmalakṣaṇayā svabhāvānupalabdhyā abhāvavyavahāra eva sādhyate nābhāvaḥ`[652]iti tat paro vighaṭayituṃ, yac coktaṃ `na pratiṣedhamātram anupalabdhiḥ, tasya sādhanāsiddheḥ`[653]iti
T11arhebt_u:4716: loko hi kevalapradeśadarśanāt ghaṭābhāvam eva prathamaṃ pratipadyate kevalapradeśajñānasaṃvedanadvāreṇa ghaṭajñānābhāvapratipattyā vā tato ghaṭābhāvasya vyavahāram |
T11arhebt_u:4717: tena lokapratītyanusāreṇa pratiṣedhyād anyasya pradeśasya pratiṣedhyajñānād vā tajjñānasya yo bhāvas tallakṣaṇo 'bhāvaḥ
T11arhebt_u:4719: [S. 169a.] ghaṭābhāvaṃ sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa ca yathākramaṃ sādhayitum, sa ca ghaṭābhāvavyavahāram ity evaṃ vyavasthāpayituṃ yuktam |
T11arhebt_u:4720: na caivam api vyavasthāpane [asma]tpakṣasya kācit kṣatiḥ |
T11arhebt_u:4721: tathā hi -- pāramparyeṇāpi yad anupalabdheḥ tvadabhyupagatāyāḥ siddhaṃ tat tat eva siddhaṃ
T11arhebt_u:4723: ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- yathā bhavato jñātṛ-jñeyadharmalakṣaṇā bhāvarūpā dvividhā 'nupalabdhis tathā mamāpi jñātṛ-jñeyadharmalakṣaṇopalabdhyabhāvo
T11arhebt_u:4725: tatra jñeyadharmalakṣaṇenānyabhāvena pratyakṣasiddhena pratiṣedhyābhāvo jñeyadharmalakṣaṇopalabdhyabhāvarūpa 'nupalabdhisaṃjñitaḥ setsyati |
T11arhebt_u:4728: tataś ca kuto 'navasthā yena sādhanāsiddhiḥ syād iti |
T11arhebt_u:4729: tatra[656]anyabhāvalakṣaṇa iti pratiṣedhyāt tajjñānāc ca yo 'nyo bhāvaḥ pratiṣedhyaviviktaḥ pradeśaḥ tajjñānaṃ ca tadātmako 'bhāvaḥ vivakṣitād bhāvāt pratiṣedhyād bhāvāt tajjñānāc cānyatvād {p. 178.1} anupalabdhitvena bhavato 'bhimataḥ svayaṃ svarūpeṇa pramāṇenendriyapratyakṣeṇa svasaṃvedanapratyakṣeṇa ca siddhaḥ saṃs tasya
T11arhebt_u:4730: [S. 169b.] pratiṣedhyasyābhāvavyavahāraṃ jñānābhidhānapravṛttilakṣaṇaṃ sādhayet tatsiddhisiddho vā tasyānyabhāvalakṣaṇasyābhāvasya yathoktasya siddhyā siddho vā tadabhāvas tasya pratiṣedhyasya 'bhāva iti evam apīṣyamāṇe na kaścid viśeṣaḥ tvadabhimatānupalabdhito
T11arhebt_u:4733: nanv asty evaivam iṣyamāṇe viśeṣo 'nyabhāvalakṣaṇānupalabdhir itarayā[658]vyavahitā tadabhāvavyavahāraṃ sādhayed itarā tu sākṣād ity āha -- sa viśeṣo nāsti yena viśeṣeṇānupalabdhyā 'bhāvarūpayā vastusaṃsparśarahitayā 'smadabhimatayā
T11arhebt_u:4738: abhāvavyavahārāsiddhiprasaṅgaḥ`[659]iti, tad apy asat, yataḥ sa eva
T11arhebt_u:4740: tadabhāvasyānupalabdhitvenāsmanmatasya pratiṣedhyābhāvasya tadupalabdhyabhāvasya ca kiṃ kasmāt na sādhanaṃ liṅgam iṣyate? |
T11arhebt_u:4741: tathā hi sati lokapratītir anusṛtā bhavati |
T11arhebt_u:4742: kiṃpunaḥkasmāt punaḥ abhāvasya dvividhasya siddhir eva tadabhāvasiddhiḥ na tatsādhyā kācid anyā [S. 170a]
T11arhebt_u:4743: vidyata ity asmanmataniṣedhārthaṃ lokātikrāntam iṣyata iti pūrvapakṣaḥ |
T11arhebt_u:4744: atrāha -- apṛthaksiddher anyabhāvāt tadabhāvasya pṛthaksiddher abhāvāt kuto liṅgaliṅgitā
T11arhebt_u:4745: tathā sambandhābhāvāc ca anyabhāvatadabhāvayor na liṅgaliṅgiteti |
T11arhebt_u:4746: prathamaṃ tāvat kāraṇaṃ [T. 334a.] vivṛṇvann āha anyabhāvas tadviviktapradeśātmakas tāvan na sādhanaṃliṅgaṃ pratiṣedhyābhāvasya, `tadupalabdhir api tadabhāvasya na sādhanam` iti paścād vakṣyate |
T11arhebt_u:4749: sādhanam? ity āha -- yatsiddhau yasya vastunaḥ siddhau pratītau yasya
T11arhebt_u:4750: aparasya {p. 179.1} vastuno na siddhir na pratītiḥ tad vastu tasya vastuno
T11arhebt_u:4753: yathā -- yadā dhūmapratītau nāgniḥ pratīyate tadā tayor
T11arhebt_u:4754: lliṅgaliṅgibhāvo bhavati, na tu dhūmapratītikāla eva pratīyamāne 'gnau |
T11arhebt_u:4755: yadi nāmaivaṃ tataḥ kim? ity ata āha -- anyasya vastuno yo bhāvaḥsvabhāvaḥ tatsiddhyaiva tatpratītyaiva tadabhāvaḥ tasya [S. 170b.]
T11arhebt_u:4756: pratiṣedhyasyābhāvaḥ prasidhyati pratīyate anyabhāvasyaiva tadabhāvātmakatvāt tatsiddher eva tatsiddhilakṣaṇatvāt |
T11arhebt_u:4757: naiyāyikās tu manyante -- pratiṣedhyābhāvo hi prasajyapratiṣedhātmakas
T11arhebt_u:4758: tuccharūpas tasya kathaṃ tadanyabhāvarūpatā?, bhāvābhāvayor virodhāt |
T11arhebt_u:4759: tataḥ kathaṃ tadanyabhāvasiddhyaiva tadabhāvasiddhiḥ syāt? ity ata āha --
T11arhebt_u:4760: tasya tadanyabhāvasya pradeśalakṣaṇasya tasmād anyena pratiṣedhyena ghaṭādinā asaṃsṛṣṭarūpasya rahitātmanaḥ kevalasya pratiṣedhyena śūnyātmanaḥ |
T11arhebt_u:4762: kathaṃ bhāvasya tuccharūpatā svabhāvaḥ, virodhāt?, iti cet; na, pararūpeṇa tasyāpi tuccharūpatvāt
T11arhebt_u:4766: tataḥ katham asya pratiṣedhyena tuccharūpatā [S. 171a.] virudhyeta? |
T11arhebt_u:4768: ^2hy ayam atuccharūpaḥ[660]syān na pararūpeṇa, anyathā katham asyānyabhāvatvaṃ parasya vā tatrābhāvaḥ syāt? |
T11arhebt_u:4769: yo hi yadabhāvarūpo na bhavati sa evāsau bhavati, tatsvarūpavat |
T11arhebt_u:4771: tasmāt sarvabhāvāḥ pararūpeṇa niḥsvabhāvaḥ svarūpeṇa rūpavattve 'pīty anavadyam |
T11arhebt_u:4774: kevalam anapekṣitarūpāntaram abhāvamātraṃ prasajyapratiṣedha iti loke kathyate |
T11arhebt_u:4776: na tu rūpāntaraṃ pararūpatucchātmakaṃ na bhavati |
T11arhebt_u:4778: tadrūpaśūnyatayā, kathaṃ tasya prasajyapratiṣedhātmatā na syāt pararūpeṇa?
T11arhebt_u:4780: akāraṇapratītau[663]sāmarthyāsambhavāt[664]| tādātmyābhāve hi prasajyapratiṣedhasya paryudastāt [S. 171b.] pratītau tatkāraṇatve sati
T11arhebt_u:4782: tasya tadanyāsaṃsṛṣṭarūpasya yat tattvaṃ tasya pratiṣedhyatuccharūpatāyā vyavasthāpakaṃ pramāṇaṃ pratyakṣarūpam tat eva
T11arhebt_u:4783: -- na taduttarakālabhāvino [T. 335a.] `nāstīha ghaṭaḥ` iti vikalpāt, tasya gṛhītagrāhitayā smṛtitvenāpramāṇatvāt -- anyasya ghaṭādes tatrāsato
T11arhebt_u:4784: vyavacchedasyābhāvasya siddhes tadabhāvātmakasyaiva pradeśasya tena grahaṇāt |
T11arhebt_u:4785: dvividho hy ayaṃ pradeśo ghaṭāsaṃsṛṣṭarūpas tadvyāvṛttarūpatayā tato 'nyo ghaṭavān api, kevalaś ca ghaṭaṃ prati
T11arhebt_u:4786: apratipannādhārabhāvaḥ[665]| ^4tasya tadvivekena[666]pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇe ghaṭād anyatvaṃ ghaṭavirahaś ca gṛhīta eva bhavatīti na
T11arhebt_u:4787: vastvasaṃkarasiddhyarthaṃ, `ihedaṃ nāsti` ity evam arthaṃ ca pramāṇāntaram anveṣaṇīyam
T11arhebt_u:4788: vistaraś caitad uttaratra vakṣyata iti āstāṃ tāvat |
T11arhebt_u:4789: yataś cānyabhāvasiddhyaiva tadabhāva uktena nyāyena siddhyati tato nānyabhāvaḥ pratiṣedhyābhāvasya liṅgam |
T11arhebt_u:4790: dvitīyaṃ kāraṇaṃ vyācakṣāṇa āha -- sambandhābhāvāc ca iti |
T11arhebt_u:4791: anyabhāvatadabhāvayor na [S. 172a.] kaścit sambandho 'sti tataḥ kuto liṅgaliṅgibhāvaḥ iti
T11arhebt_u:4795: anyathoktena nyāyenānyabhāvasyaiva tadabhāvarūpatve tādātmyāt kathaṃ sambandhābhāvaḥ? |
T11arhebt_u:4797: tac ca tasya ityādyasyaiva vivaraṇaṃ vyatirekamukhena ekārthasamavāya
T11arhebt_u:4799: pareṣāṃ hinaiyāyikādīnāṃvyatiriktāv eva kṛtakānityatvākhyau dharmāv ekasminn eva dharmiṇi samavetāv iti kṛtakasyānityatvenaikasminn arthe dharmiṇi samavāyaḥ sambandhaḥ dhūmasya
T11arhebt_u:4801: atraikarthasamavāya iti saṃyogaḥ sa eva samavāyaśabdenoktaḥ |
T11arhebt_u:4803: pareṣāṃ tv agnidhūmau svāvayaveṣv eva samavetāv iti na tayor ekārthasamavāya ādhārādheyabhāvo veti dhūmasyāgner upari darśanāl laukikaḥ sambandha uktaḥ |
T11arhebt_u:4804: janyajanakabhāvo vā iti pāramārthikaḥ sambandho 'bhihitaḥ, paramārthato 'gner janakatvāt itarasya ca janyatvād iti |
T11arhebt_u:4805: nanu ceśvarasenena saha vicāraḥ prakrāntaḥ tat kim itinaiyāyikābhimatasyāpi sambandhasyānyabhāvatadabhāvayor abhāva ucyate |
T11arhebt_u:4806: satyam, [S. 172b.] prasaṅgena tu tanmatasyāpi niṣedhārtham uktam |
T11arhebt_u:4807: pūrvaṃ hy anyabhāvagrāhipratyakṣasiddhatvāt pratiṣedhyābhāvasya na tadarthaṃ pratyakṣāntaraṃ `nāstīha ghaṭaḥ` ity evamākāraṃ kalpanīyam iti prasaṅgataḥ kathitam |
T11arhebt_u:4809: yadānyabhāvagrāhipratyakṣasiddho 'yaṃ tadabhāvo na bhavati tadā pratyakṣāntaraṃ `nāsti iha ghaṭaḥ` ity evam ākaraṃ
T11arhebt_u:4810: viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvalakṣaṇāt ^11sannikarṣād iṣṭaṃ bhavatā[673]| na cāsati sambandhe 'nyabhāvatadabhāvayor viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo yuktaḥ, atiprasaṅgāt
T11arhebt_u:4813: evaṃ sambandhasvarūpam ākhyāya tasyehāsambhavam āha -- naivam, yathā kṛtakatvānityatvayor agnidhūmayor vaikārthasamavāyādilakṣaṇaḥ sambandho naivaṃ kaścid bhāvābhāvayoḥ sambandho yena asya tadabhāvasyānyabhāvaḥ sādhanaṃ syāt |
T11arhebt_u:4814: yāv ekatrārthe dharmirūpe pravarttete tayor ekārthasamavāyo bhavati |
T11arhebt_u:4815: anyabhāvaś ca pradeśākhyaḥ svāvayaveṣu yeṣu varttate na tatra ghaṭābhāvaḥ |
T11arhebt_u:4816: evaṃ hi pradeśāvayaveṣu ghaṭo nāstīti syāt na pradeśe |
T11arhebt_u:4833: na ca tadabhāvo dravyam ity uktam |
T11arhebt_u:4834: nāpy ādhāra(rā)dheyabhāvo, yataḥ so 'pi saṃyoganimitta ucyate `iha kuṇḍe badarāṇi` iti
T11arhebt_u:4838: samavāyaḥ, pañcānām eva hi dravyādīnāṃ padārthānāṃ samavāyitvam iṣyate; na cābhāvaḥ pañcasv antarbhavatīti |
T11arhebt_u:4839: na ca tadātmānupakāre saty ādhāravyapadeśaḥ sambhavati |
T11arhebt_u:4843: 173b.] yataḥ svakāraṇasamavāyaḥ, sattāsamavāyo vā kāryatocyate bhavadbhiḥ
T11arhebt_u:4844: | anyabhāvas tu pradeśākhyo 'sya na kāraṇam, trayāṇām eva hi
T11arhebt_u:4852: sambandhibhedād bhede vā sāmānyādiṣv api tatprasaṅgaḥ |

T11arhebt_u:5686: na hi tādātmyatadutpattibhyāṃ svasādhyapratibandhavaty ekatra hetau kvaciddharmiṇi saṃbhavati dvitīyas tallakṣaṇas tatraiva hetuḥ
T11arhebt_u:5689: tadavyabhicāriṇo hetor dvitīyasya tatra kutaḥ sambhavāvakāśa iti |
T11arhebt_u:5690: nanu yadi tathāvidhaviśeṣasambhave [S. 205a.] sati viruddhāvyabhicārilakṣaṇaṃ hīyate, ekasaṃkhyāvivakṣā vā vyārthā, tathāpi naiva hetvabhāvaprasaṅgaḥ, tat kim uktaṃ hetvabhāvo vety ata āha -- na ca naiva tasya viśeṣasya pratibandhalakṣaṇasya, yato vastuto 'sambhavat
T11arhebt_u:5692: svarūpaṃ tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇaṃ nirddeśyate bhavadbhiḥ yathā 'smābhir nirdiṣṭaṃ ydrūpaṃ pratītya pratipadya pratiyoginaḥ sambhavāsambhavāu utpaśyāmaḥ |
T11arhebt_u:5693: yatra sa viśeṣo nāsti tatra pratiyoginaḥ sambhavaḥ kalpita āgamāśraye 'numāne |
T11arhebt_u:5694: yatra tv asti sa viśeṣo vastubalapravṛtte 'numāne tatra pratiyogino 'sambhava iti yata evaṃ
T11arhebt_u:5695: tasmān nāsty eva bhavatāṃ sa viśeṣaḥ -- bhavadbhir na jñāyata eva sa viśeṣa ^1iti -- tasmāt[745]sarvatra yatrāpi pratiyogī na dṛśyate tatrāpi ṣāṅkyā pratiyogiviṣayayā bhavitavyam |
T11arhebt_u:5699: tasyāpi prāk pratiyogidarśanād itareṇa sarvakālam adṛṣṭapratiyoginā kaścid viśeṣo lakṣyate [T. 365a.] yaddarśanāj jñāyeta `atra pratiyogī sambhavati nyānyatra` iti darśanādarśanamātranibandhanayor anvayavyatirekayoḥ
T11arhebt_u:5701: tathāpi paścāt tatra pratiyogī dṛṣṭa iti sarvatra tattulyalakṣaṇe pratiyogisadbhāvaśaṅkā na vivarttata iti |
T11arhebt_u:5702: syān matam -- yeṣu pratiyogī sambhavati teṣvaśyam eva kadācid asāv upalabhyate |
T11arhebt_u:5703: yeṣu tu puruṣāyuṣeṇāpi nopalabhyate trṣv asau {p. 217.1}
T11arhebt_u:5705: tataḥ sa tathāvidho hetur bhaviṣyati, tat kathaṃ hetvabhāvo
T11arhebt_u:5706: 'smākam? ity ata āha -- na ca ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:5707: yeṣām api hi pratihetuḥ sambhavati teṣām api naiva sarvadā tasya pratihetor upalabdhiḥ pratipattṛṛṇām
T11arhebt_u:5708: na hy asarvadarśinām upalabdhiḥ sarvabhāvasattāṃ vyāpnoti,
T11arhebt_u:5711: pratiyogī na dṛśyate tatra tadāśaṅkā [S. 206a.] kathaṃ kriyate? |
T11arhebt_u:5715: śiṣyaparamparayākumārilotpādāt prāgdṛṣṭapratiyogiṣūpanyasteṣu, tenaiva prajñātiśayaśāktinā pratihetava utprekṣitāḥ tatas taddarśanāt yāvaj jīvaṃ adṛṣṭapratihetuṣv api tadāśaṅkā nivarttate |tataḥ katham āśaṅkā niṣpramāṇikocyate? |
T11arhebt_u:5716: tulyalakṣaṇe hi ityādikam api pratiyogisambhavāśaṅkākāraṇam uktam eva |
T11arhebt_u:5717: na ca pratiyogisambhavam āśaṅkamānas tannimittasaṃbhavāt `utprekṣeta hi` ityādyākrośamātrea nivarttayituṃ śakyate |
T11arhebt_u:5718: tenāsya[747]pratiyogyāśaṅkāpanodakṣaṃ kiñcit kāraṇam abhidhānīyam yathā 'smābhir abhihitaṃ `svabhāvahetor viparyaye bādhakapramāṇavaśād ātmyaniścaye saty anvayavyatirekayos tatra nirṇaya;
T11arhebt_u:5721: yata evaṃ sarvatra pratiyogyāśaṅkā na nivarttate bhavad darśane tena kāraṇāniścayaḥ pratiyoginaḥ sambhavayoḥ `iha pratiyogī sambhavati iha tu na sambhavati` ity evaṃrūpa ^4iti -- tasmād[748]vastuto
T11arhebt_u:5723: tasyāniścitatvād ekasaṃkhyāvivakśāv ādināṃ na kaściddhetuḥ syāt |
T11arhebt_u:5724: na hy aniścitalakṣaṇo hetur bhavatīty upasaṃhāra iti |
T11arhebt_u:5725: tad evaṃ `kiṃ yo vastuto 'sambhavatpratihetuḥ sa samyagjñānaviparyayahetur iṣṭaḥ` iti amuṃ vikalpaṃ nirākṛtya dvitīyaṃ vikalpaṃ nirācikīrṣur āha -- athāpradarśitapratihetuḥ samyagjñānaviviparyayahetur iṣṭa iti sambandhaḥ |
T11arhebt_u:5726: ayaṃ ca pakṣaḥ kiladiṅnāgācāryasyāpy abhimata iti para upadarśayann āha -- yathāha diṅnāgācāryaḥ
T11arhebt_u:5728: śrāvaṇatvasya hi na kathañcidvyavacchedahetutvam iti diṅnāgācāryeṇokte pareṇābhihitam --
T11arhebt_u:5731: yady atraśabdākhye dharmiṇy anityatvahetuṃkṛtakatvaprayatnānantarīyakatvādilakṣaṇaṃ kaścidvaiśeṣikādir na darśayet[749] tadā'yam pradarśitapratihetur hetur eva bhavet iti |
T11arhebt_u:5732: tad evamācāryāpadaiḥ[750]sākṣitve datte mujam utkṣipya śāstrakāraḥ
T11arhebt_u:5734: tadidaṃ[754]sumahadvyasanam āyatam -- gurubhir abhihitatvād aprakāśyam, na hi gurūṇāṃ doṣaḥ prakāśayituṃ yuktaḥ, nyāyam anupālayadbhiḥ asaṃvaraṇīyam
T11arhebt_u:5740: kaḥ punar atra doṣo yenedaṃ kaṣṭataram ity āha -- sa tāvad ayaṃ śrāvaṇatvalakṣaṇo hetur vastuni
T11arhebt_u:5741: śabdādīni ^10svasādhyaṃ tattvam[758]nityatvaṃ tatprakṛtīni tadātmakāni kṛtvā [S. 207b.] tacchrāvaṇatvaṃ pramāṇaṃ yeṣāṃ
T11arhebt_u:5742: puruṣāṇāṃmīmāṃsakavaiyākaraṇadīnāṃ tān {p. 219.1} abhyudayena svarggeṇa niḥśreyasena cāpavarggeṇa yojayitvā |
T11arhebt_u:5743: tathā hi -- vastutattvaṃ yāvan kleśān na prajahāti tāvat svargamāsādayati, kleśāṃs tu prajahan
T11arhebt_u:5747: punar uttarakālaṃ pratibhāvatā[760] prajñājātīyenavaiśeṣikādinā puruṣeṇa hetvantarasya[761] [T. 367a.] pratihetoḥ nidarśanena yad asya nityatvasādhanasāmarthya pratihetvanupadarśane[762]satyāsīt tadupadarśanena[763]utkīlitam apanītam iti |
T11arhebt_u:5749: pracyāvya, tāṃś ca tatpramāṇakān[764]puruṣān svarggāpavarggasampadaḥ pracyāvya śrāvaṇatvalakṣaṇo hetuḥ śaktivaikalyāt paritrātum aśakto bhraṣṭarājya iva rājā tapovanaṃ gacchati svair eva duścaritair[765]iti kim atra vayaṃ brūmaḥ? |
T11arhebt_u:5750: tad evam upahasyaitasmin pakṣe [S. 208a.] doṣam upadarśayann āha --
T11arhebt_u:5752: yadā hy apradarśitapratihetur hetur iṣyate tadā puruṣapratibhākṛtaṃ sādhanatvam abhyupagataṃ bhavati |
T11arhebt_u:5753: tataś ca vastuto na kiñcit sādhanam asādhanaṃ vā prāptam |
T11arhebt_u:5754: tathā hi -- yadā pratihetur nopadarśyate tadā sādhanam, yadā tūpadarśyate tadā na sādhanam
T11arhebt_u:5757: vikalpadvayam -- kiṃ paramārthato hetus taddharmabhāvī, utā
T11arhebt_u:5759: tatrādyaṃ vikalpam adhikṛtyāha -- sa ca hetur yo 'sau
T11arhebt_u:5761: sa yadi svabhāvataḥ eva tasmin sādhyadharme satyeva bhavati ity evaṃśīlo 'smad upavarṇitapratibandhopagamāt [T. 367b.]
T11arhebt_u:5762: yadīṣyate tadākatham anyathākriyeta hetvantareṇātaddharmabhāvī kathaṃ kriyate? |
T11arhebt_u:5766: hetulakṣaṇānāṃ yaḥ svabhāvaḥ -- `saty eva sādhyadharme bhavanātmakaḥ` --
T11arhebt_u:5767: tadanyathābhāvasya tadviparyayasya abhāvād ubhayoś ca svasādhyadharmāvinābhāvitve {p. 220.1} svabhāvata eva dharmiṇy ekatra tayor bhāve viruddāv ubhau svabhāvāv ekasya syātām |
T11arhebt_u:5768: na caikasya viruddhau svabhāvau sambhavataḥ, viruddhadharmādhyāsena tasyaikatvahāniprasaṅgāt
T11arhebt_u:5769: atha dvitīyo vikalpas tadā ataddharmabhāvīca asaty api sādhyadharme bhavanaśīlaḥ pratibandhānabhyupagamāt katham anyadā'pi
T11arhebt_u:5771: naiva tadāpi sādhanam, na kevalaṃ pradarśitapratihetvavasthāyām iti |
T11arhebt_u:5773: yata evaṃ bhāvānāṃ svabhāvo 'nyathā kartuṃ na śakyate, viruddhobhayasvabhāvaś caiko na
T11arhebt_u:5775: sādhyenāvinābhāvinor yathoktalakṣaṇayoḥ [T. 368a.] kāryasvabhāvahetvoḥ tallakṣaṇasya kāryasvabhāvalakṣaṇasya pratihetor asambhavād alakṣaṇam
T11arhebt_u:5780: sa ca pratihetuḥ svalakṣaṇayuktayoḥ kāryasvabhāvayor na bhavaty eveti kathaṃ taddhetulakṣaṇaṃ syād iti |
T11arhebt_u:5781: tad evam anayor dvayo rūpayor yaḥ sambhavo yathoktāvinābhāvā 'sambhave satīti rūpāntaropagame 'pi hetvābhāsataiveti hetvābhāsās tato 'para iti ity asyārtho vivṛta iti |
T11arhebt_u:5783: abādhitaviṣayatvaṃ vivakṣitaikasaṃkhyatvaṃ ca kāryasvabhāvahetvor evāvinābhāve sati bādhāpratihetvor asambhavāt vyavacchedyābhāvatvena saty api liṅgadharmatve tallakṣaṇaṃ na bhavatīty uktam |
T11arhebt_u:5786: tathā hi -- jñānaśabdapravṛttinimittaṃ jñātatvam ucyate, tac ca jñānam eva, tadutpāde sati jñāta iti vyavahārāt |
T11arhebt_u:5787: na ca tat liṅgasyātmarūpam iti [T. 368b.] kathaṃ liṅgalakṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati?
T11arhebt_u:5788: | yady api vikalpapratibhāsī sāmanyākāro liṅgatayā 'vasthāpyate tathāpi na jñānasya liṅgadharmatā
T11arhebt_u:5789: na hy asau svatantra eva liṅgam |
T11arhebt_u:5791: vikalpabhedāna {p. 221.1} svatantrāṇām anvarthāśrayaṇāt tatkalpitaviṣayāda[766]'rthapratipattāv[767] anarthapratilambha eva syāt
T11arhebt_u:5794: sādhyasādhanasaṃkalpe vastudarśanahāneḥ[768]svalakṣaṇasya kvacidananvayāc ca taddharmatām eva tv anusmaranto vikalpā
T11arhebt_u:5797: na ca tasya kāryāder ātmarūpaṃ [S. 209.2a.] jñātam |
T11arhebt_u:5798: vikalpāvabhāsī ca sāmānyākāro naiva vikalpasyātmabhūtaḥ, tasya nīrūpasya vasturūpavirodhāt
T11arhebt_u:5800: yasmād abāhyāsyāpi bāhyatayā vyavasitasyānanuyāyino 'py anuyāyitayā sāmānyāmakatvaṃ tathātve cāsya vikalparūpatayā kutaḥ? yadā ''ha --
T11arhebt_u:5805: etad eva sādhayann āha -- kiṃrūpād ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:5806: kim ātmakāt hetor anumeyo 'rtho jñātavyaḥ iti cintāyāṃ prakṛtāyāṃ pratipattuḥ puṃso yad avisaṃvādakaṃ liṅgaṃ tasya svarūpam abhidhīyate
T11arhebt_u:5807: śāstrakāraiḥ [T. 369a.] yasya rūpasya darśanādayaṃ pratipattā ôyatra
T11arhebt_u:5808: tadrūpasambhavaḥ tat sādhanam tadrūpavikalam asādhanamô iti pravibhāgena vyavasthāpya yat tatra sādhanatvena vyavasthāpitaṃ tasyeṣṭārthasannidhānasampratyayāt pravṛttim avalambate tathā, etasmiṃś ca nyāye [S. 209.2b.] vyavasthite yad asya liṅgasyātmarūpaṃ tal lakṣaṇaṃ
T11arhebt_u:5809: bhavitum arhati pakṣadharmādivat na tu yat pararūpam |
T11arhebt_u:5810: syād etad -- jñātasya liṅgasya sādhakatvād yuktaiva sādhyasiddhyupayogino jñānasya liṅgalakṣaṇatety ata āha --
T11arhebt_u:5812: yady anumeyapratītijanmany upayujyate jñānam iti tanmātreṇa liṅgasya lakṣaṇam iṣyate tadā 'tiprasaṅgaḥ prāpnoti |
T11arhebt_u:5813: tam evāha -- evaṃpratipattijanmany upayogamātrāl liṅgalakṣaṇatve prameyasya arthasya puruṣasya {p. 222.1} pramātuḥ adi śabdāt saṃyogasamavāyādīnām ālokamanaskārādīnāṃ liṅgalakṣaṇatvaṃ bhavet atra kāraṇam āha -- na hi teṣv api prameyādiṣu asatsu liṅgini jñānaṃ bhavatīti kṛtvā |
T11arhebt_u:5814: atra paro 'niṣṭam āpādayann āha -- niścitagrahaṇaṃtarhi ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:5815: yadi pararūpatvāj jñānaṃ liṅgalakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati tadā ca yad etadācāryeṇa --
T11arhebt_u:5818: niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavataś cābhimataṃ [T. 369b.] tan na karttavyam |
T11arhebt_u:5819: tathā hi -- niścayo hi liṅgasya pararūpam eva |
T11arhebt_u:5820: sa cet tallakṣaṇam, jñānaṃ kim iti neśyate yato niścayo vijñānam eva tadviśeṣatvād asyeti
T11arhebt_u:5821: siddhāntavāy āha -- na na karttavyaṃ kintu kartavyam eva tasya [S.
T11arhebt_u:5823: tām evānyārthatāṃ darśayann āha -- sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:5824: pare hi sapakṣe darśanamātreṇāsapakṣe cādarśanamātrato gamakaṃ hetum icchanti |
T11arhebt_u:5825: teṣāṃ naiva darśanamātreṇa sādhyasiddhau samartho hetur bhavatīti jñāpanārthaṃ niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam |
T11arhebt_u:5826: yataḥ sator vidyamānayor api darśanādarśanayor agamakatvaṃ hetor dṛśyate `sa śyamaḥ, tatputratvāt` ityādau |
T11arhebt_u:5827: yata evaṃ tena kāraṇena sapakṣe bhāvena vipakṣe sarvatrābhāvaviśiṣṭenā 'sapakṣe ca sarvatrābhāvena sapakṣe tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇabhāvaviśiṣṭena gamako hetur ity asyārthasya jñāpanārthaṃ lakṣaṇavākye niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ boddhavyam |
T11arhebt_u:5828: etad uktaṃ bhavati -- yāv eva sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ bhāvābhāvau pratibandhasādhakapramāṇavṛttyā niścitau tābhyām eva hetur gamako bhavati,
T11arhebt_u:5829: na tu yathākathañciddarśanamātreṇety asyārthasya [S. 210b.] jñāpanāya niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam iti |
T11arhebt_u:5831: yena viśiṣṭayor bhāvābhāvayor eva khyāpanāya niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam, na
T11arhebt_u:5832: rūpāntarābhidhānāya, anātmarūpasya [T. 370a.] ca lakṣaṇatā na yujyate,
T11arhebt_u:5833: tena pararūpaṃ liṅgasya lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati |
T11arhebt_u:5834: yataḥ tena jñānādinā pararūpeṇa liṅgasya na kiñcid rūpaviśeṣo 'bhidhīyata iti |
T11arhebt_u:5835: {p. 223.1} nanu ca pare 'pi sapakṣavipakṣayor bhāvābhāvābhyāṃ gamakaṃ
T11arhebt_u:5836: hetum icchanti, darśanādarśane tu tayor eva sādhake, tat kim arthaṃ
T11arhebt_u:5837: niścitagrahaṇam? iti, ata āha -- tau hi ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:5838: yady api pare bhāvābhāvābhyām eva gamakaṃ hetum icchanti tathāpi sapakṣa eva bhāvo
T11arhebt_u:5840: na ca tatas tau tathāvidhāu sidhyataḥ, pratibandhavikalānām apy athānāṃ
T11arhebt_u:5843: yau `hetoḥ sapakṣe eva bhāvo 'sapakṣe cābhāva eva` ity evam ātmakau
T11arhebt_u:5844: bhāvābhāvau tau tadbhāvasya sādhakaṃ yat pramāṇaṇ tādātmyatadutpattisādhanaviṣayaṃ tadvṛttyā boddhavyau |
T11arhebt_u:5847: tadanabhyupagame hi hetoḥ sapakṣa eva bhāvaḥ sarveśāṃ hetumatāṃ bhāvānāṃ sādhyenānugamadarśane sati vipakṣe cābhāva eva sādhyavikalānāṃ sarvārthānāṃ hetuviviktānāṃ upalambhe sati syāt |
T11arhebt_u:5849: yata upayāntaraṃ nāsti tena kāraṇena tayor viśiṣṭayor bhāvābhāvayoḥ pratipādanāya niścitaśabdaḥ prayukto lakṣāṇe lakṣaṇakāeṇeti |
T11arhebt_u:5850: nanu ca bhāvābhāvavacanamātrād eva pramāṇato niścayo labhyate anyathā tayor eva sattā na prasidhyed iti, ata āha -- yady api ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:5852: ity anenaiva sapakṣāsapakṣayoḥ [T. 370b.] bhāvābhāvavacanamātreṇa niścitagrahaṇanirapekṣeṇa tayor bhāvābhāvayor yat sādhanaṃ pramāṇaṃ tasya vṛttir yady apy ākṣipyate |
T11arhebt_u:5853: kathaṃ punar niścitagrahaṇam antareṇa bhāvābhāvavacanamātratas tadvṛtteḥ ākṣepaḥ? ity āha -- anyathā yadi tatsādhanapramāṇavṛttir nākṣipyeta, [S. 211b.] tadā tayor eva
T11arhebt_u:5854: sapakṣavipakṣayor eva bhāvābhāvayor yā sattā svarūpavyavasthā tasyā aprasiddheḥ |
T11arhebt_u:5855: kasmād aprasiddhiḥ? ity āha -- jñānasya upalabdher yā sattā utpattiḥ tannibandhanatvāj jñeyasya bhāvābhāvalakṣaṇasya sattāvyavasthāyāḥ
T11arhebt_u:5857: na hy upalambham antareṇa svata evārthāḥ {p. 224.1}
T11arhebt_u:5859: tasmād idam evaṃrūpaṃ naivaṃrūpam iti tadākārajñānodayād eva vyavasthāpyate |
T11arhebt_u:5860: yata evaṃ tasmāt sarvatra śāstre loke vā jñeyasattāvyavasthaiva niścitagrahaṇaṃ vinā 'pi
T11arhebt_u:5863: parārthatvāc ca śāstrapraṇayanasya tatsādhanapramāṇavṛttir ākṣipyata iti sambandhaḥ |
T11arhebt_u:5864: kīdṛśaṃ punas tacchāstrapraṇayanaṃ yat parārtharūpatayā svavyavasthāpitajñeyasattāsādhanaṃ pramāṇam ākṣipati? ity āha --
T11arhebt_u:5866: yadi nāmaivaṃrūpaṃ parārthaṃ śāstrapraṇayanaṃ tathāpi kathaṃ tat sādhanapramāṇavṛttim ākṣipatīty āha -- tadrūpaṃ tasya liṅgasya trirūpasya rūpaṃ svabhāvaṃ śāstroktaṃ ye pratipattāro na vidanti, na teśāṃ tatas
T11arhebt_u:5867: trirūpāl liṅgāc chāstroktād vāñcite 'rthe pravṛttir bhavati,
T11arhebt_u:5869: | yata evam iti tasmāt paropalakṣaṇatvād eva pareṣāṃ jñāpakatvād eva
T11arhebt_u:5870: pravarttake trirūpaliṅge jñānaṃ siddham iti yady api niścitagrahaṇam atiricyate tathāpi tāv eva liṅgasya sapakṣāsapakṣayor bhāvābhāvau viśiṣṭau śastroktau `sapakṣa eva bhāvo 'sapakṣe cābhāva eva` ity evaṃrūpau kecinnaiyāyika prabhṛtayaḥ, pare darśanādarśanamātreṇa -- ye darśanādarśane pratibandhasādhake na bhavataḥ -- tanmātreṇa vyavasthāpayanti yata eva[770] iti tasmāt teṣāṃ vādināṃ niśedhārtho 'yaṃ
T11arhebt_u:5872: yadi tu paravipratipattiḥ na syāt tadā naivāsau prayujyeteti |
T11arhebt_u:5873: kim iti punar darśanādarśanābhyāṃ bhāvābhāvaviśayābhyāṃ sapakṣā[sa]pakśayoḥ viśiṣṭau bhāvābhāvāv anvayavyatirekātmakau [T. 371b.]
T11arhebt_u:5874: neṣyeta ity āha -- sator api ityādi saty api kvacit sapakṣe bhāvadarśane hetoḥ kvacic cāsapakṣe 'bhāvadarśane `sa śyamaḥ, tatputratvāt` ityādāv anvayavyatirekayoḥ saṃśayāt |
T11arhebt_u:5875: tathā hi -- anvayo nāma sarvatra saty eva sādhye hetor {p. 225.1} bhāvo vyāptyā cāsati sādhye hetor abhāvo
T11arhebt_u:5877: na ca kvacit sati sādhye [S. 212b.] hetor bhāvadarśane 'pi
T11arhebt_u:5878: tanmātreṇa tathābhāvaḥ sarvatra bhavati, apratibaddhasvabhāvānāṃ sahabhāvaniyamā 'bhāvāt |
T11arhebt_u:5879: tathā kvacit sādhyābhimatasyābhāve saty abhāvadarśane 'pi hetoḥ sarvatra tadabhāve 'vaśyam abhāvaḥ, tadanāyat tasya tannivṛttau niyamena nivṛttyabhāvāt |
T11arhebt_u:5880: tasmāt pratibandhaprasādhakapramāṇavṛttyaiva yathoktau sapakṣāsapakṣayoḥ bhāvābhāvau sidhyataḥ nānyatheti vipratipattinirāsārtham eva niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam ity upadarśayann āha -- tasmāt ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:5881: asmābhiḥ ityācāryakṛte niścitagrahaṇe 'nyatrāsmākam abhimatatvāt asmābhiḥ ity āha |
T11arhebt_u:5882: tad evaṃ vipratipattinirāsārthaṃ niścitagrahaṇam, asatyāṃ tu vipratipattau tan na kartavyam eveti pratipādya ata eva nyāyāt jñātatvaṃ rūpāntaraṃ na bhāvatīti [T. 372a.] darśayann āha -- yato 'pi ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:5885: tenaiva trairūpyavacanenaiva tatsādhanapramāṇākṣepataḥ avagatatvāt pratipannatvād iti |
T11arhebt_u:5887: yathā pakṣadharmatvavacanenaiva hetor upanayasyārtho 'vagatas tasya dharmiṇi hetoḥ sadbhāvapradarśanātmakatvāt, pakṣadharmavacanasya ca tadrūpatvāt
T11arhebt_u:5888: tataḥ pṛthagupanayo [S. 213a.] rūpāntaraṃ na bhavati; tathā trairūpyāt jñānaṃ, tadvacanenaivāvagatatvād iti |
T11arhebt_u:5889: atra paro 'niṣṭam āpādayann āha -- anvayavyatirekayor api ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:5890: yadi trairūpyavacanenaiva sāmarthyāj jñānaṃ labhyata iti tat tataḥ pṛthag na vaktavyam hanta tarhi anvayāt pṛthag vyatireko na vaktavyaḥ vyatirekāc ca pṛthaganvayaḥ |
T11arhebt_u:5892: ekasyānvayasya vyatirekasya vā prayogād ubhayasya gateḥ |
T11arhebt_u:5893: kṛtaṃ ca tayoḥ pṛthagvacanaṃ, tathā jñātatvasyāpi trairūpyād gamyamānasyāpi pṛthagvacanaṃ karttavyam iti |
T11arhebt_u:5897: sapakṣe bhāva ucyate, vyatirekaḥ punar abhāvo 'sapakṣe |
T11arhebt_u:5898: na ca tau parasparam ākṣipataḥ [T. 372b.] parasparam antarbhavato vidhipratiṣedharūpayor bhinnasvabhāvatvāt |
T11arhebt_u:5899: na ca yo yato bhinnasvabhāvaḥ sa tatrāntarbhūto yuktaḥ |
T11arhebt_u:5900: nanu ca yady anvayavyatirekayor bhinnarūpatā kathaṃ tarhi trairūpaṃ liṅgam ucyate? |
T11arhebt_u:5901: na hi parasparabhinnāv ātmānāv evāsya yujyate, svabhāvabhedalakṣaṇatvād vastubhedasya |
T11arhebt_u:5902: naiṣa doṣaḥ, yato yathā 'nvayavyatirekau [S. 213b.] vyavasthāpyete na vā nayo(-pyete tathā
T11arhebt_u:5907: vyāvṛttibhede 'pi ca paramārthato bhedo nāstīty ekaṃ liṅgaṃ trirūpam ity ucyata iti |
T11arhebt_u:5908: kathaṃ tarhi prāguktam[771]`nānayor arthaḥ kaścid bhedaḥ, anyatra
T11arhebt_u:5909: prayogabhedād` iti? ata āha -- ekaṃvākyam ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:5910: anvayamukhena vyatirekamukheṇa vā prayuktam ekaṃ vākyam ubhayam anvayaṃ vyatirekaṃ ca bhinnalakṣaṇam eva gamayatīty ucyate 'smābhir naiko 'rthaḥ svabhāvo
T11arhebt_u:5912: atra para āha -- natu(nu) tatraiva ityādi |
T11arhebt_u:5917: bhāvaḥ` ity atra lakṣaṇavākye tadarthatayā[773]tadabhāve 'bhāvo gamyate;
T11arhebt_u:5920: pratibandhaś ca tādātmyatadutpattibhyāṃ tadbhāve bhāvarūpa eva |
T11arhebt_u:5921: tataś caikenaiva sapakṣāsapakṣyor bhāvābhāvapratipādakena [S. 214a.] prativiśiṣṭena lakṣaṇavākyenobhayagater dvitīyavacanaṃ na karttavyam iti |
T11arhebt_u:5923: tataś ca yaduktam `anvayavyatirekayor api tarhi na pṛthaktvam iti` tat tadavastham eveti
T11arhebt_u:5929: niyamas vyāpakasya `sapakṣa eva bhāvo 'sapakṣe cābhāva eva` iti sāvadhāraṇasya dvitīyākṣepanāntarīyakatvāt
T11arhebt_u:5931: na ca tāvataikavākyapratipādanamātreṇobhayor ekasvabhāvatā bhinnasvabhāvānām apy athānām ekavākyena pratipādanāt |
T11arhebt_u:5932: ekenaiva ca lakṣaṇavākyenobhayagatāv api yat pṛthaabhidhānaṃ tat prayoganiyamārtham |
T11arhebt_u:5934: vaidharma(rmya)vacanaṃ na karttavyam, vaidharmyaprayoge ca sādharmyavacanam iti na punar ekābhidhānenānavagatasya rūpāntarasya
T11arhebt_u:5936: na ca tathā trairūpyavacanena jñānanibandhanena jñeyasattāvyavasthāyāḥ paropalakṣaṇāthena ca śāstrapraṇayanenāśritajñānasyaiva trairūpyasya [S. 214b.] pratipādanāl labdhasya jñānasya punarvacane na kiñcit prayojanam astīti nāsya
T11arhebt_u:5939: parasparama'bhinnasvabhāvau bhaviṣyataḥ tata evaikavākyārthāntarbhāvād ity ata āha -- na punaḥkevalau ekavākyārthānapekṣau tadantarbhāvamātreṇa sapakṣāsapakṣayoḥ bhāvābhāvau parasparam ākṣipato 'ntarbhavataḥ
T11arhebt_u:5941: nanu ca niyamavantāv api bhāvābhāvau kevalāv eva, tayoḥ parasparākṣepe kevalayor
T11arhebt_u:5942: api tatprasaṅga ity ata āha -- niyamavantau ca sāvadhāraṇavākyapratipāditau na kevalau kintu sahitāv eva |
T11arhebt_u:5945: tad evaṃ sāvadharaṇena [T. 374a.] vākyena naiva kevalo 'nvayo
T11arhebt_u:5947: tadantarbhāvāt tu dvitīyagatiḥ kintu parasparānantarbhūtāv eva sahitāv ekena vākyenābhidhīyeta iti pratipādyopasaṃharann āha -- tasmāt tatraiva [S. 215a.] sapakṣa eva bhāva
T11arhebt_u:5948: {p. 228.1} ity anena vākyena na sapakṣe bhāva evocyate |
T11arhebt_u:5950: asapakṣe 'bhāvo 'pi, tathā cetareṇāpy asapakṣe 'bhāva eveti vacanena nābhāva eva kevala ucyate kintu sapakṣe bhāvo 'pi, yena kevalavacanena bhāvo 'bhāvo vā tadātmakatayā dvitīyam ākṣiped yato 'nayoḥ pṛthagvacanaṃ na syāt |
T11arhebt_u:5951: tasmād yadā 'nvayavyatirekau bhāvābhāvāv abhipretau tadā tau bhinnarūpāv eveti kathaṃ tayoḥ na pṛthaktvam? |
T11arhebt_u:5952: atha niyamavatā vākyenābhihitau tadaikavākyād evobhayagateḥ pṛthagvacanaṃ na karttavyam eva
T11arhebt_u:5953: tat tu kṛtaṃ nāpratipannapratipattaye kintu prayoganiyamārtham ity uktam etad iti |
T11arhebt_u:5954: syānmatam -- yathā 'nvayavyatirekau bhāvābhāvalakṣaṇau na parasparātmakau tataś ca tayoḥ parasparato rūpāntaratvam, evaṃ paropalakṣaṇaśastrapratipāditāt trailakṣaṇyād bhidyata eva jñānam, na
T11arhebt_u:5955: tatrāntarbhūtam, tato rūpāntaraṃ bhaviṣyatīty ata [T. 374b.] āha --
T11arhebt_u:5956: naivam, yathā 'nvayavyatirekau bhāvābhāvalakṣaṇau parasparam anantarbhūtau, na tathā jñānaṃ paropalakṣaṇaśāstrapratipādite trailakṣaṇye 'nantarbhūtam |
T11arhebt_u:5959: upalakṣaṇa(ṇaṃ) trairūpyaviṣayāṃ pratītiṃ kāryante yena śāstreṇa tato yat trailakṣaṇyaṃ pratīyate āgṛhītajñānaṃ tasmād avyatirekād āgṛhītajñāne trailakṣaṇye 'ntarbhāvād iti yāvat, iti tasmān na lakṣaṇāntaraṃ trairūpyād iti |
T11arhebt_u:5960: tad ayam atra samudāyārthaḥ -- yadi jñātatvaṃ jñānaśabdapravṛttinimittaṃ uktena prakāreṇa jñānam evocyate tadā
T11arhebt_u:5963: karmabhāvo jñātatvam ucyate tadā 'pi jñeyasattāvyavasthāyā jñānasattānibandhanatvāt trairūpyavyavasthaiva tatsattāvyavasthāpakaṃ jñānam ākṣipati |
T11arhebt_u:5964: tatas tadapekṣo 'pi karmabhāvo 'nuktasiddha iti na tadvacanaṃ pṛthakkarttavyam |
T11arhebt_u:5966: tad evam abādhitaviṣayatvādikaṃ rūpatrayaṃ nirākṛtya nigamayann āha --
T11arhebt_u:5974: mā yatata imā yā tadrūpā bala (?) tribhuvanasya hitāya śaśvat |
T11arhebt_u:5978: na guror upadeśam agrahīt bubudhe vastu tato ... ... dhīḥ |
T11arhebt_u:5979: yatato sma na tasya vṛddhaye na parispanditum apy apārayat ||
T11arhebt_u:5980: jīvātmakaṃ cāndramasaṃ ca tejaḥ kṛtāspadaṃ tasya tai ...t |
T11arhebt_u:5981: tad eva śaktā ...thā paratra citrā hi viśvaprakṛti...nāḥ || 2
T11arhebt_u:6000: [740] sādhyam apy asādhyaṃ asādhyam api sādhyaṃ pare prāhuḥ [741] -dī sandarśa- -- T.
T11arhebt_u:6006: [746] This verse is omitted in the T.
T11arhebt_u:6027: [766] tair vikalpaiḥ kalpito yo 'sau viṣayo 'vagru(?)rūpo na dhūmatvādiḥ [767] vahnitvādi
T11arhebt_u:6029: [769] nānābhūtānāṃ yo vāstavavyatireka ekasya ca vyāvṛttiparikalpitas taṃ darśayantaḥ [770] evaṃ -- T.
